title: Exceptional Service From Everyone
text:
From Check-In to Check-Out, everyone was incredibly helpful and friendly to us. Also got a nice gift from the hotel for our anniversary.

Very nice upgrade and a very clean and comfortable room as well. 

Special shoutout to Nicole for always going above and beyond to make our stay memorable!

title: Luxury Birthday Weekend Get-Away Made Pefect
text:
Second time I've stayed here and I may have loved it EVEN more.  From start to finish, everyone at the hotel makes you feel so welcome.  My stay was a couple's weekend getaway (mixed with a birthday celebration) and the hotel totally looked out for us.  Not only did they upgrade our room, but they also had a WONDERFUL cookies-and-wine treat waiting for us.

Those delights aside, the food in all the restaurants was amazing.  And as we left, the bellhop was super helpful in making sure we got to the airport for the best price (Uber vs taxi) and in the best amount of time.

I can't wait to go back.

title: Wow. The definition of a luxury stay
text: My wife and I booked through capital one travel portal and our stay honestly exceeded our expectations. Beautiful, clean, and the food was amazing. With the venture x card we were able to get the room upgrade, early check in, and the daily complimentary breakfast. Will definitely be returning!

title: State of the Art Hotel - Fine, Quiter and Comfortable.
text:
One of the most vibrant and fine areas of Manhattan, everything was close by, and the car was parked safe inside a garage. 24/7 front desk, the entire staff is welcoming, and they went beyond to make us feel pampered and fulfill our requests. 
The Hotel has a great dining, bar and a coffee place inside the facility in case you don't want to go outside. However, you will find about everything to eat nearby as well. 
Some of our favorite's amenities were the Hudson Yards, Moynihan Train Hall Concourse and the hiking/trail that is located right outside the hotel which takes you to the Vessel area in less than 5 minutes or you could keep left and keep walking for a longer walking too. Thanks again for made our visit to Manhattan a much joyable and memorable trip.

title: Absolutely amazing
text: Everything was fantastic at this hotel! The room was very nice and had wonderful views. The king bed was probably one of the most comfortable I have ever slept in. Breakfast was really good and quantities were huge. We only had dinner in one of the restaurants but the food and wine were of excellent quality. Service during our stay was 10/10. Everyone was really nice and accommodating.

title: Great location , Great hotel
text: This hotel was awesome, location worked great, went to a game at MSG, had great dining options in hotel.  Just out the door was Whole Foods and Starbucks along with independent coffee shop.   Easy based to work from for a lot of things in Manhattan.

title: Great stay
text: The Pendry hotel is an an excellent location and is def worth the $$ - would def book again next time I stay in the city. Linaya was exceptional in helping us book activities and everything else we needed.

title: Favorite Place to Stay in NYC
text: Can't beat the location! The location works for me because I usually travel by train to NYC for work. Hotel is across the street from Moyihan Hall. The hotel has great (business and personal) late and early food options, good nearby resturants, 3 coffee options steps from the front door, and there is a whole foods behind the hotel, if you want a cheap, quick and healthy option. The rooms are also very spacious for NYC rooms. I've booked direct on pendry and through 3rd party sites (i've stayed there 3 or 4 times in the last couple of years)...check in has been easy each time. Also hotel team staff is friendly and professional. I am writing this positive review, because I've consistently had a positive experience the last 2 years.

title: Lovely and accommodating hotel in an incredibly convenient location
text: Manhattan hotel rooms are typically miniscule. The hotel rooms here are commodious.  They are incredibly comfortable, clean and beautifully appointed.  The beds are very comfortable and there is room to work or eat comfortably.  The bathrooms are well designed as are the rooms, lighting and TV placement.  It's also very close to everywhere you'd want to be, including a block away from Moynihan Station and Madison Square Garden, and, amazingly, it's very quiet! I would definitely stay here again!

title: The most incredible stay in NYC.
text:
This was without a doubt the best hotel I have stayed in. We stayed for a week here and every day was fabulous. 

We had the most amazing welcome, drinks upon arrival (rum and ginger punch) and a lovely welcome cocktail and cookies in our room waiting for us. The guys on the door and reception were so friendly every day. The reception team also helped us pick a rooftop bar one night and gave us recommendations, which was really helpful. 

The room service guy was so nice, he made such an effort and went through everything upon delivery to make sure we had everything. 
The daily cleaning service was always immaculate and turned down service included macaroons. 
The location is spot on, close to everything we needed and had a chilled vibe. Nice and quiet at night. We could also open the window in our room, which was a massive plus for us, as we like our fresh air. :) 

The gym was fabulous, had a separate recovery room and peloton area, as well as the machines, stair climber, large DB area and lots of treadmills and bike. 

The Bar Pendry had a nice atmosphere, and we also had food that night too. 
When we left, the concierge gave us water for our journey to the airport - a lovely touch. Everything was just fabulous and I can't explain how amazing the attention to detail was. 

We would absolutely love to go back soon.

title: Great location. Friendly staff. Will stay again.
text: Stayed here for a night out and was pleasantly impressed with the hotel accommodations as well as the friendliness of the staff. Will definitely look to book again this time with the family! A secret little gem, pop up ice skating rink around the corner and NOT crowded at all like Bryant park.

title: Amazing hotel in Manhattan West, NYC
text: We’ve just found our new favorite hotel in Manhattan!  Stayed here for 4 nights and everything was perfect - excellent location, beautiful property, over the top service, and wonderful restaurants and bars. Can’t wait to return!!

title: Top notch NYC hotel in Hudson Yards
text:
Front desk and door attendants great - I will be back.  Just for hotel management to know so they could improve: 1) had do not disturb sign on door and housekeeping knocked to see if they could service room.  Probably better to call if need to check as I had a late check  2) Room service breakfast; although pancakes looked well cooked, they were gooey on the inside (inedible), side of tomato’s as a $7 side option I thought would be nice thick slices but were 3 poor chosen thin as could be, and fresh squeezed OJ was not really fresh squeezed.   

Great gym, great location, great new rooms.  

Thank you to the super staff.

title: Great NYC hotel option
text: We had an excellent experience at Pendry Manhattan West.  The accommodations and amenities were first rate for a reasonable price at this location.  Staff couldn't have been more helpful.  If you're looking for a mid-town hotel with updated and attractive rooms and a great fitness center, Pendry is a great choice.

title: Great Midtown spot
text:
Location is perfect. Located on a quiet street with a lovely public area behind the hotel. It was festive with Christmas lights and ice skating. There are several good spots to grab breakfast or a drink, and a Whole Foods for other necessities. We walked all the way uptown one day and all the way downtown the next day. There is access to the Highline just steps away. 
Shout out to Front Office Manager Oksana Yaqubic, who took care of a room issue immediately, professionally  and perfectly!

title: We’ll be back!
text: We come to NYC once a year. This was our first stay at the Pendry.  We LOVED it. The rooms are lovely…and quiet. The service remarkable. A special THANK YOU to John at the front desk for making our stay (and anniversary) so special. Best hotel gym I’ve ever used. Zou Zous was terrific. We didn’t want to leave…but alas had to. We will be back!

title: Top service
text: I visited the Pendry Hotel for 3 nights with my 13 year old son. We travelled from Spain to watch an NBA game and decided to stay here as it was near to Maddison square gardens. The hotel is super modern and clean. The service was absolutely first class, everyone working here was very friendly and did everything to make our stay enjoyable. A special mention to John on the front desk team who went far and beyond to help us with all of our needs during our stay. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York, and I will definitely stay here in my next visit.

title: Outstanding
text: We were in NYC to see Here We Are at the Shed Theatre in Hudson Yards.  Our first time on that side of the city.  We stayed at the Pendry and it was exceptional in absolutely every respect.  Now tied with the Greenwich as our favorite place to stay in NYC.

title: A West Coast Vibe In Manhattan.
text:
Located in Manhattan West at the northern tip of the High Line, the Pendry is steps from Hudson Yards & sights like the Edge. The eye-catching facade is made up of undulating waves of floor-to-ceiling windows providing front facing rooms semi-circle window nooks. I admired my corner studio whose features included an open concept living plan with 1 500 sq. ft. footprint.  A cocooned window seating area was neat but the pinnacle amenity was the wall of floor-to-ceiling windows affording lots of natural light and superior vistas of the cityscape. The heavenly marbleized bath was outfitted with a soaker tub (by a window), walk-in shower and double vanity. A wide complement of eating/drinking venues graces the Pendry. The sultry Bar Pendry is a classic waterhole where I enjoyed small bites and handcrafted drinks ......like the Moscow Mule.....kicked like a mule. The Garden Room is a casual relaxing space serving small bites, daytime coffee and evening cocktails. Zou Zou's, a well respected eatery, serves Eastern Mediterranean food-fare the likes of Duck Borek and fire roasted Leg of Lamb. I selected the Octopus Carpaccio, Smoked Cherry Baby Lamb Chops, Lemon Frozen Yogurt and Prosecco to wash it down.........a terrific food collage. Chez Zou is a premier cocktail lounge with unusual pairings like Bananas & Bourbon and Vermouth & Picked Cucumbers and others. The Vista Lounge is a modern dining space focusing on glorious breakfast food-fare for guests and locals alike. The Pendry wellness amenities feature a 24/7 1700 sq. ft. Fitness Center and a Movement Studio with high-tech equipment and Peleton Bikes, the bikes can be requested in-room.
So, if you are searching for a Manhattan escape in high-end, California-inspired digs
......................then try the .............Pendry..............a West Coast vibe in Manhattan.

title: Excellent Service Green & Clean
text:
Non toxic in nearly every way. This very natural hotel setting which is clean and comfortable. The staff is easy going, kind, and helpful. 

The environment is restful with a biophillic approach. Hardwood used on doors and drawers with a linseed type finish. Wool is used for the carpets and the beds have dust mite zipped covers on the mattress. There are no strong chemical odors of any kind. The doors are heavy and alleviated hallway noise. The housekeeping was excellent and turn down service thoughtful with children’s slippers and macaroons complimentary every night. 

The only thing I would say is the lotion and soaps are heavy with perfume so bring your own if sensitive. The bar soap was the only product we used. The lobby is a little cold in winter but on 4th floor you have comfortable cozy restaurant. They could fix this possibly this with entry heaters or supplemental in their garden lounge. The shared public restrooms are all male/female which left a lot of pee on the seats. I think better attention could be spent in this area or designation for sexes would be helpful or plan on using your room if you have small children as I do. 

The food is excellent farm to table options without organic listed. The restaurant staff including wait staff are very welcoming and polite. Reservations required for main dining Zou Zou. It’s excellent! My only complaint here was watching the expediter touch things like a marker and items handed to her by staff then place her bare hands into the herbs and food bowls. I know I’m a germ a phobe by many standards but this is how people get sick. 

Location is near Hudson Yard with an emphasis on sustainability. The Edge is one of NYC’s latest attractions which was worth the ticket price is not too crowed as when we visited the lines were not long. There is a Whole Foods with in steps of the hotel which was great for glass bottled water and necessary items. The Pendry uses plastic bottled water but provides plenty  in the rooms. 

The nearby shopping is all the usual big chain suspects with high end luxury on 1st floor. Our favorite store is Falconeri cashmere on the 2nd level which had great clearance sale for winter goods at the time of our visit 1st week in January. 

Approx 20 minute ride to the West Village and Central Park but near the High Line. City Bikes offered right out the door. It’s very easy to get a cab at the Hudson Yard Shopping district and of course easy to get an Uber from this location late night. 

We will definitely stay here again. We loved this hotel and understand a chain is coming to Tampa where we live full time!

title: Amazing stay and fantastic staff
text: I highly recommend staying the Pendry Manhattan. The rooms are beautiful and clean and the staff is very professional and accommodating. The hotel is modern with a fully equipped gym, great restaurants, and a great location.

title: Overall satisfaction
text: My experience during my trip exceeded expectations for service, cleanliness and friendliness. Great value, great location and great vibe. The Hudson Yards location and experience made the experience even better.

title: Excellent hotel!
text: We stayed at Pendry Manhattan West for my sister’s birthday weekend. Everyone at Pendry was welcoming and the beverage director made my sister’s special day extra memorable. We will be returning next year.

title: Was worth taking the step up in price
text:
I wanted to take my wife for a really nice trip to New York as it was her first time in the city.  I am not a New York expert in any way shape or form and there are obviously a LOT of hotels there, so I spent quite a long time looking for the right place.  I think the first choice most of us have is what budget we have to spend.  Do you want to spend USD200 - USD400 to stay in a Hilton, Omni,  Sheraton etc type of hotel, USD400 to USD600 to stay somewhere a step up from that or USD600+ to stay in one of the best hotels.  If you are taking that first step up and pay more than the standard then the hotel has to be worth it and I think the Pendry was!  My reasons why are below:-

Location - This was one of the most important factors for me.  Once again I am not a NY expert but I kind of figured out that most of the things I would want to see, places to go shopping or restaurants to go eat were somewhere between Washington park and the bottom of Central Park.  Given that there would be some days I might not want to walk or get the metro but get an Uber I wanted somewhere that was sort of in the middle of that area and therefore accessible via Uber (which is very expensive!).  The second thing was that reading reviews on here people would complain about coming out of their hotel around Times Square/Midtown and being met by sights they did not want to see….The Pendry is in a quiet, clean street with high class offices and a business square behind it so was basically in a perfect and safe location.

Room - As we weren’t planning on spending lots of time in the room it didn’t matter to us to book a luxury room.  We stayed in the standard room which was spacious, tastefully decorated, with a nice view over the office square behind the hotel.  The shower was powerful and constantly hot.  The room was clean on our arrival and well cleaned during our stay there.  The room was also quiet, the bed was large and comfortable and the black out curtains cut out the light and the air conditioning was perfect so you could have the quality sleep there that you would expect from a hotel this level.

The rest of the hotel - We didn’t chose to eat in the hotel and didn’t use any of the facilities really but the gym was big and it had a couple of nice looking bars that would have been good to have a late night drink in.  Given the huge choice of places to eat in NY, perhaps the hotel could think a little bit outside of the box to incentivize guests to go and eat at the restaurant…

The service/staff - We aren’t demanding/fussy guests so had limited interactions with the staff other than at check in where Violet was very nice and efficient and managed to find us a room when we arrived early which was hugely appreciated and at check out where Luis was super professional and just left us with a great final impression.  The hotel also took a few different deliveries for us and held and delivered all of them for us efficiently and professionally.

My experience was that for the price band you pay for the Pendry there is nothing I could really fault the hotel for and did not regret spending the extra.  I would definitely stay there again and wish the hotel and all the staff there huge continued success!

title: A beautiful retreat in the city!
text: Staying at the Pendry Manhattan West is a must for your trip to NYC! Not only is it close to so many amazing locations (the High Line, Chelsea Market, Hudson Yards, etc.) but the rooms are absolutely gorgeous and provide you with a perfect relaxing evening after exploring all day. The beds are soft and luxurious and the bathrooms are so clean. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful and the on-site restaurants and bars are divine. I can’t wait to stay here again the next time I’m in the city!!

title: Delightful stay at Pendry Manhattan West
text: Our first time, but definitely not our last, at a Pendry Hotel.  This property is beautiful and the experience exceeded our expectations.  The staff were well trained and very courteous.  We'll be back!!

title: Nice but did not meet expectations
text:
Reasonably nice hotel conveniently located close to MSG. 

The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet, especially by nyc standards. 

Valet is provided which is an added convenience (for an additional charge, of course).

The reasons for 4 stars versus 5:
* Room service was supposed to arrive within 40 minutes. After waiting over an hour, we called to check on the order and were told there was a large group slowing the kitchen down. We were going to a show at MSG so if we’d been provided a more realistic time frame, we would have skipped the order.

* I called before we left the hotel to request the tray/food be removed from the room. When we came back hours later, it was still there (gross)

* the mini bar had a $13 restocking fee (!)  and sales tax applied on top of the (already very high) prices so the items were actually about 30% more expensive than listed. I hate being nickel and dimed.

I booked a standard king room for $1,447/nt.  I expected that these kind of kinks would be worked out.

title: Beautiful guestrooms, but service fell short of expectations.
text: The rooms and public spaces are just as good as advertised, and the Pendry was a comfortable place to call home for our week-long stay. The design is immaculate and the property is new enough that signs of wear are few and far between. However, the service fell short of expectations, with unanswered emails, pre-arrival requests that weren't handled in advance, and some disappointing moments at check-in and check-out that felt more like what you'd encounter at a run-of-the-mill hotel rather than the class of property the Pendry clearly aspires to be. Given the price and the less-than-central location, I'm unlikely to return. It's a pity, as the guestrooms really are quite comfortable.

title: Nice stay in Manhattan
text: In a time when some of our preffered hotels are either closed or renovating, staying at the Pendry was a great experience. The hotel is pretty new, the rooms are fine and modern; some have a decent view from the park besides it etc. Checkin/out uneventfull, good wi-fi, attentive staff.

title: Beautiful rooms, lousy service.
text: We have stayed at the Pendry West Manhattan twice - June and Nov 2023. The hotel is beautiful but the service needs some serious improvements. Reservations were not correct when we arrived (they had us double booked), promised to look into issues by the front desk, but there was no follow through; no car service to go to or 3 blocks, no amenity upon arrival despite having one the first time, little things like a trash can in each bathroom in the room (they are broken into 2 - one with a shower and sink and one with toilet and sink, guest services lacked knowledge about amenities and restaurants within the same complex. Expected a 5 star hotel experience and felt like it was a 3 for service for a very expensive room rate.

title: Exceptional Hotel ,
text: What a luxury venue to enjoy NYC from. The staff are so accommodating and friendly. The bedding and toiletries were exceptional making sleep no problem with the jet lag. The atmosphere was calm & peaceful a slice of zen in the Kissel and bustle of a huge city. So Central to everywhere. Gorgeous restaurant and bar conveniently stationed next to the Lobby as well as a coffee shop for early risers. Would definitely recommend this stunning hotel to anyone wanting to stay in  NYC.

title: The best
text: Everything first class.coolest location and surroundings. The hotel is new and well kept with service the same. Youthful exuberance.. close to shopping and great hotel restaurants. New York needs more hotels that are fresh like this one

title: The best place to stay in NYC!
text: Everyone should try to take the opportunity to stay at the Pendry if they're travelling to New York, whether for business or pleasure, solo or with family. The hotel is beautifully designed, the rooms are clean and modern, and the service is exceptional from check in to check out. You won't regret it!!

title: Amazing location
text: Everything was literally within walking distance, don’t recommend getting a rental, parking is expensive and not worth it since everything is in walking distance, the hotel staff is amazing and tend to all your needs.

title: Au Top !!
text:
Très bel hôtel à 5min à pied de la station de métro Hudson Yards, le calme sans les désagréments.
(sur le chemin du métro, on trouve un petit café ”old country coffee” assez sympa et confortable)

title: Great location
text: This location is perfect for anyone looking to explore the city to its fullest, I was amazed by how I kept on finding new things to do. title: Absolutely perfect!
text: From the lobby staff to the housekeeping service, this hotel clearly strives to satisfy its guests.  Beautiful rooms with beautiful views and a location that can't be beat.  This is my new favorite hotel in NYC.

title: So great that I changed my plans to stay here again!
text: I have fallen in love with this hotel! I stayed here on a Thursday evening before a work event and then changed my plans so that I could stay here again two days later. The rooms are calming and so comfortable, the food is excellent, and the service is incredibly friendly. It’s really an oasis and I don’t want to leave!

title: Hudsons Yards convenience
text: Rooms are so very quiet and very bright and spacious.   Nicely laid out with an awesome shower. The location is Very close to Madison square Gardens for a concert.  Located with access to the Hi Line as well.

title: Weekend getaway
text: Is a great location easy to get many places.  Peloton, the garden, great restaurants.   Time square is 15 minute taxi ride.  The hotel is beautiful and Manhattan west plaza is amazing and Starbucks is close by

title: Anniversary getaway
text: We flew into town to spend a whirlwind weekend in NY for our anniversary.  Everything about our stay at the Pendry was 5 star worthy. The service was impeccable from the moment we walked in (and was consistent throughout our stay), the room was beautiful, and the view was breathtaking. The smallest details were executed to perfection which made the stay one to remember. My only regret is that we could not stay longer. This will be our go to hotel anytime we are back in NYC.

title: Best hotel in NYC
text:
Beautiful spacious clean rooms.  The staff are all really nice and helpful, we loved every minute it’s worth the money. Hotel is in a nice area and easy to walk around the city from here. Breakfast was good. 
Thank you for the upgrade our room was the best we’ve ever had and we’ve stayed in a lot of 5* hotels.

title: Top class - great gym
text: The Pendry in Manhattan West Is top class. Relatively new and really good service on all counts. Nice bar and restaurant. Probably the best and newest equipment in the gym than any other hotel I have stayed at in New York. Great location and close to everything.

title: Fantastic Hotel
text: Incredible location, beautiful property, great rooms and excellent staff. This is my second stay at this property. I wrote a positive review last time, and the desk staff were aware of the review. This is the kind of service and attention to detail that I think the Pendry personifies.

title: business trip
text:

Hotel was clean and all was good.
Would highly recommend this property when in the area. Great restaurants in the area.

title: Amazing place to stay
text: Rooms are lovely, food and service are impeccable. 24 hour room service is a huge perk, the food is always fresh and prepared well even if you order late night dining. The hotel location is very convenient, very close to the high way and a short walk from Penn Station. The wi-fi could be slightly better which could be my only criticism.

title: I almost want to keep this hotel secret
text: This is our go to hotel in Manhattan.  First, it has a great feel to it, modern, soft lighting, a calm place in the midst of a hectic city.  Its location can’t be beat if you’re arriving at Penn Station or attending an event at the Garden.  It’s worth the price.  The rooms are exceptional, quiet, and luxurious.  And lastly, the entire staff are such seasoned hospitality pros.  They call you by name as you enter, even if you haven’t been there for months.  They’ve won our loyalty and I can’t say that about any other hotel.

title: Nicest hotel in midtown Manhattan
text:
Hands down the nicest high end hotel in midtown Manhattan.  Beautifully designed, courteous staff, clean, luxurious, great location.
If you can splurge and stay at a high end hotel, this is the one to stay at.  Also had great experience hosting a board meeting in the conference rooms.

title: ALWAYS FRIENDLY

title: Perfect Getaway
text: We've stayed at a number of hotels but Pendry Manhattan West is definitely worth its 5 stars! The staff was very friendly from check in to check out. Thank you for making our stay so memorable!

title: Excellent Property and Location
text: Hotel maintains an intimate, comfortable feeling. Rooms are very well appointed with excellent finishes and details. Very comfortable. Location is central but out of the hustle and bustle. A great place to stay in Manhattan.

title: You get what you pay for
text: This is one of the finest hotels anywhere.  The location is amazing.  The bed and pillows absolutely top shelf.  Every detail of the room is well thought.  Talk about quiet, OMG.  The fitness center was fantastic and so clean and well equipped.  It felt like our private residence rather than a hotel.  We will return, soon.

title: Excellent property in the heart of Manhattan
text: Very nice property with friendly staff and excellent location. Minutes from broadway and shopping areas but on a much quieter road.. right next to great restaurants and whole foods which makes the experience even better

title: Fantastic boutique hotel with great views and location
text: the Pendry is steps away from the High Line and a beautiful plaza with restaurants and shops. The room small but very elegant and well appointed. Staff were incredibly helpful. This is our new NYC home.

title: Excellent
text:
Beautiful hotel, in a great part of town close to everything.  The restaurants and bars were great, and beautifully appointed.  Excellent service, great amenities in an overall beautiful setting.

Highly recommend

title: Date Night
text: Awesome stay, excellent service from the staff!  My wife and I were greeted upon arrival and made to feel like we were about to have a relaxing stay.  The layout of the rooms was carefully designed to feel much bigger than they were.

title: Stay
text:
First time visiting the property. Beautiful and cozy hotel, yet elegant! Great design and areas were very cleaned!

Room service was spotless and the food quality was great! Location was on point as well!

title: The best hotel in New York City!
text: The hospitality is unrivaled.  The welcome warm and southernly, so unexpected in NYC of all places! Best staff I've ever interacted with at a hotel and I've traveled extensively throughout the world.  Hats off to the entire staff, manager, front desk, bellmen, operator, maid, room service, just all of it.

title: Great trip
text: Trip for anniversary was a wonderful trip. Beautiful fit and finish and materials throughout. Good food and service throughout the trip. Nice touch of a bottle of wine complimentary for our anniversary

title: Great Stay
text: We had an excellent stay at the Pendry Manhattan West. Room was excellent. All the staff were top notch. Service was timely and everything exceeded our expectations. Location is great. We did 2 live in studio Peloton rides during our trip and the location could not be better for that. Also proximity to Hudson Yards is nice.

title: Not 5 star
text: We are currently staying in a queen room with our family. The room size is okay, and superficially nice enough, but the finishings are not at all high end and the layout is not at all practical. The service at the front desk is one of their biggest challenges - accordingly we’ve asked for the general manager’s contact details - which has not been provided. I could go on - and I’m hoping Mr Bhasain will provide his business card in my room today, so we can speak directly. It is one thing write a critical review and then post-event have a hollow promise of welcoming you next time - but we are here now and would like to discuss directly the issues we’ve faced - rather than publicly share all details, with a hotel that we hope can improve, I’m hoping this message will be actioned earlier enough for us to discuss while we are still here. More generally, I’d tread with a caution - it’s nice enough here, but certainly not 5*. Room 1410.

title: Very Nice Hotel
text: Very nice hotel although the rooms are quite small.  The staff is very friendly (particularly Sasha the bellman).  Nice water pressure in the shower although the water leaks out into the vanity area. Need a pocket door separating bathroom from the rest of the room.  Nice fitness center and good location to nice restaurants.  Zou Zous is nice but extremely loud.  Beds are very comfortable.

title: Feels like Home
text: Every surface, fabric, pillow, light switch, and carpet is a luxurious experience. The staff is ever-present in the most quiet and professional way. The bar and food options within the hotel make it effortless to turn a business trip into a social one and vice versa. And even being a cool, design forward hotel, my four year old son comes and has a ball. I come away from this hotel feeling more vibrant and rested every single time. It's become my home away from home.

title: First Time in the Manhattan West Oasis
text: Recommended for a business trip. Got the lowest cost room with least favorable view -however, even though the room was small-ish, its layout felt roomy and very comfortable and the desk near the floor to ceiling windows was perfect for working. Bed was one of most comfortable and the shower was good pressure and temp. Lots of drawers for clothes so you can move in for however long you are staying.  Food was also quite good in the single occasion I used the restaurant (bc the plaza next door has an excellent Italian place (Ci Siamo).  Little on the expensive side but you can find deals - Highly Recommend

title: An absolutely relaxing and comfortable stay
text: It was really a great experience all around.  I arrived at about 11:00 and was hoping to get checked in early. It took the staff about 30 minutes to get my room ready, check me in, and get me to my room.  Once there, i was totally spoiled by the great accommodations.   When it came time to leave we left at about 11:00 am and did not feel pressured to depart.   My only regret was that we had to leave at tall.  A truly enjoyable experience.

title: 3 day Business trip to NYC
text: Very good all round experience for a NYC Hotel. So nice to stay in a new modern facility with very attentive and welcoming staff. Bar & restaurant convenient and v good quality for client entertainment. All very compact. Will definitely stay there agian the next time i visit.

title: Superb hotel
text:
What a wonderful hotel. We were travelling with two children, and stayed in a Skyline Double Double interconnecting with the Skyline Alcove Studio on the 19th floor. Unlike so many hotels, they delivered on the promise of interconnecting rooms! The housekeeping was fantastic and the rooms were immaculate - and always made up by the time we returned to the hotel in the early afternoon. The rooms were quiet, and provided a lovely space to escape from the bustle of the City below. Even the coffee shop on the ground floor, Black Fox Coffee, did excellent tea and coffee.
Downsides? The breakfast, served on the 4th floor, was fine rather than stellar. I’d go to Russ & Daughters around the corner for a bagel instead. But that’s a tiny point. This is a brilliant hotel, brilliantly located. I would highly recommend it.

title: Calm in the midst of the City
text: The interior of the hotel has a very calming vibe in the midst of the city. The room was absolutely beautiful with an amazing view. The beds were extremely comfortable. We ate in the restaurant and the food was very good. I look forward to trying other Pendry locations.

title: Yet, another great stay at the Pendry
text: Our stay was wonderful… each time we’ve stayed, our experience has been exceptional. From the personal attention, to the beautiful accommodations… everything is 5 star! The gym is spacious, clean and well equipped.  There are various dining options both within the hotel and in the immediate area.  Location is conveniently located in midtown but away from all of the hubbub. This is the only place we’ll stay when in NYC.

title: Always a delightful stay
text: This is our Go-to hotel on the West side in Hudson Yards. So easy to get to from NJ and you’re in the best area of everything  new & exciting. The staff is the absolute best. Pleasant and accommodating 100% of the time. I particularly love the hotel aesthetic.  the hushed tones, masculine clean feel and spacious shape of the rooms. The bars are fun and the food delish. I honestly wouldn’t consider staying anywhere else.

title: Well designed luxury stay in Hudson Yards.
text: Fabulous rooms with floor to ceiling windows & a fresh air window to let a breeze in. The beds are comfy and the walls are soundproofed.  Separate shower room & toilet w/ sink flank the entryway and makes getting ready to go out more manageable. The staff is friendly and acknowledge you coming in and out which is nice. Oh and a clothes steamer, genius!

title: A Gem in Manhattan
text: Our experience at the Pendry West Manhattan was second to none.  I would highly recommend!  The location was perfect as we attended a concert at Madison Square Garden...walking distance.  The establishment was exceptionally clean,  and the beds provided a wonderful night's sleep.  Cudos to all the employees.... very kind and professional.

title: Amazing place!
text:
The location was fantastic. Room was very spacious, very clean and most of all the shower, pillows and bed were the best! Didn’t want to leave!!
Must try the French toast in the vista lounge! The best!

title: Amazing stay
text: Traveled to New York for vacation. Had a wonderful stay from start to finish. Even called before our arrival and the front desk was very helpful and had suggestions on where to make dinner reservations. Location and quality of the rooms were amazing. The restaurants and bars located in the hotel were very good. Was also very close to other food options and just down the street from an huge mall for shopping. 10/10

title: Exceptional stay in NY
text: my stay at Pendry NY was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel's decor, unmatched hospitality, and stunning views created an unforgettable experience. If you're seeking a luxurious urban oasis in the heart of New York City, look no further than Pendry NY Hotel. I am already eagerly anticipating my next visit.

title: World class service
text:
Our family was completely wowed, not just by the spectacular views, room and amenities at the Pendry. But by the top tier service and attention to detail the staff provided. Okasana ensured our room was well appointed prior to our arrival and once checked in Pema, John, Nicole, Jun, David, Sasha, Miasel, Murat, Sonu all assisted in making our stay truly special. Truly grateful for their dedication to providing great service. 

We look forward to returning to the Pendry Manhattan West and exploring other Pendry locations.

title: Luxury Next Door to Moynihan Train Hall
text: Traveling into and out of Manhattan via the Acela, I wanted a 5-star hotel that was close by Moynihan Train Hall.  The Pendry was just the ticket.  The room was clean, contemporary and well appointed.  The fitness center was the best I have experienced.  The staff was welcoming and very helpful.  I highly recommend The Pendry for a luxury 5-star hotel experience.

title: The Perfect NYC Experience
text: Spend a little more to get the very best. Everything in this hotel is worth it. Top-tier rooms, amenities and Guest Staff. The location is ideal for everything including The Highline, Hudson Yards and restaurants. Not far from Broadway, and a short trip to the financial district. Anything you want is right there or close by.

title: Absolutely amazing
text: From the service to the rooms to room service and every accommodation in between, the Pendry is it. I was even able to extend two extra nights when my flight was canceled last minute. I can't wait to come back and also visit other properties.

title: Pendry Manhattan West
text:
Such a great hotel, too bad that I was there only for a short time. Upon arrival I was assisted by Jun who was able to answer all my questions (I had a bunch in my arsenal), kind Sasha helped me with my begs, housekeeping team did phenomenal job in providing the top quality service, bar had delicious cocktails, upon departure I was greeted by manager Oksana who made sure to share her business card with me and invited me back (wait for my email, I will shoot one soon). 
Professional service. Comfortable design. This hotel has everything you need.

title: Clean, elegant, friendly in NY!
text: Went on a girls trip with my 11 year old daughter.  Location was excellent as it was just the right amount of vibrancy in the area, but even more importantly the hotel decor and finishings were gorgeous!  The staff was also super friendly - from the front desk to the doormen.  Lots of nice little touches and surprises which I won't give away because that is part of the fun!  Thank you for an excellent stay.

title: The Facility is Spectacular but the People Made the Difference
text: In town with family for a niece's wedding. Can't say enough about how wonderful our stay was. The rooms are spectacular but what set it apart was the people. The doormen, room service, housekeeping, the bartender--everyone we met was gracious and genuine in their wish to be of service. Thank you!

title: Pendry Manhattan West
text: Best hotel in Manhattan.  Close to theatre, restaurants, Javitts, mid-town.  Do not miss this hotel it is outstanding.  5 stars!  From check in to the great restaurants and lounges, workout room, room service, an exceptional hotel

title: Pendry Manhattan West is a gem
text: The Pendry Manhattans West is a hidden gem.  The location by Hudson Yards is great and a nice vibrant area.  The outdoor seating is wonderful for the nice summer nights.  When your at this hotel you fee like your in a hidden part of the city.

title: Great location, easy to access from Moynihan
text:
This was our 2nd stay at the Pendry Manhattan West; girls weekend in NYC with my 12 year old daughter.  The location was great, we travel to NYC by Amtrak and the hotel is just across 9th avenue from the new station, making it really easy to travel with luggage.  Hotel is very close to the Highline which we really enjoyed, and walking distance to The Edge, the Vessel, Little Island Park.   The rooms were spacious (for NYC) and the hotel is clean and new.  The staff is not at all engaging with guests and they certainly don't go out of there way to offer you any help, insights, or to check in to see if there is anything they can offer to help with your stay.  That aspect of the hotel is rather disappointing and which is why I rated it average.  The service doesn't even compare to that of the Ritz Carlton or the Four Seasons, or other high end hotels that would be in the relative similar price range.  We are staying at the Baltimore Pendry for the first time next weekend, I will be curious to see if the experience is different or similar.  

Overall, great location if you are looking to stay near the Highline, Hudson Yards, or walking distance to Meatpacking district.  And super easy access to the Amtrak train station.

title: Wow ! Pendry rocks the details! Could not be more impressed
text: This is our second time visit the Pendry West Manhattan , we love this great location incredible service, as always, impeccable housekeeping Thanks to the wonderful attentive staff, Jasun, John ,Luis,Linaya,Deki front desk agent , and to the amazing front door team,  and special shout out to the  GM Ash Bhusin for a kind welcome gift in our room , that was very thoughtful !! Super service !!! I highly recommend this place

title: Must Visit
text:
Absolutely beautiful location.Fabulous accommodation.Staff are above and beyond Especially Jasun Front desk agent he accommodated with a smile and warm greeting.Super service 
We also want to give a shout out to the general manager Ash Bhusin
for a welcome us with a bottle of champagne in the room, this was super thoughtful and set the tone for our stay. The whole atmosphere was really enjoyable, thank you so much again !!

title: Pandry is a great place to stay
text: Pandry at Manhattan, NY has a great location that is close to Penn Station and many nice restaurants. The hotel staffs are very friendly and approachable. The room is clean and well maintained. The room service was great. Pandry is one of great hotels that I experienced. Whenever I visit NY, I always stay at Pandry.

title: You must stay here
text: Fabulous, new hotel (built in 2021) with pristine rooms and amazing views (we could see the Hudson from our room!).  We had a relaxing drink at the bar on the 4th floor and great room service for breakfast.  Zou Zou seemed like a nice restaurant but we were between shifts (4 PM) and the kitchen was closed so could not try food.  Would definitely go back.

title: Amazing stay
text:
The hotel was faultless in every way.  The rooms impeccably clean and well furnished.  The bar fantastic and the staff really couldn't do enough to make our stay equally fabulous, even down to surprising my husband with a birthday card, bubbles and cake.  The location is central and easy to reach both sides of the City.
Thank you for an amazing stay,  we will definitely be exploring the other Pendry locations in the future.

title: Great stay
text: Incredible service, as always, and stunning accommodations. Couldn’t recommend highly enough. Room service was perfect. We would love to return! Special shout out to the amazing front door team as well

title: Awesome Hotel with Great Staff and Location
text: This is a great hotel for the combination of luxury and amazing location with terrific staff.  Shopping at Hudson Yards and access to high line at same time was a highlight of the trip and can be recommended.  Easy to get around and west Manhattan is really coming along

title: Beautiful property, amazing staff.
text: Super friendly, attentive, impeccable from arrival to departure. One of the nice touches - four bottles of water in the room, plus a welcome amenity.  I really appreciated the thought towards each detail.  Highly recommend.

title: Chic, stylish, and comfortable
text: The primary reason we chose this was because of its proximity to the Peloton studios, and that did not disappoint. We were a 3 minute walk away from peloton which made getting into the live classes super convenient. The hotel itself is great- very clean, friendly staff, and decently sized rooms for NYC. Overall, we were very happy with our stay.

title: Great time in New York
text: The hotel is very up to date. The decor is grand. The rooms are spacious. Linens and towels were fantastic.  Highly recommend. Located close to Square Garden if you are coming in for a concert or sporting event.

title: Pendry Manhattan
text: Excellent new property, great service, comfortable bed, large room, 2 blocks to Penn Station, Metro and MSG.  This is the place to stay if you want to explore this area (Hudson Yards and The High Line) and easy to venture out to other parts of NY.  Restaurants nearby and on the premises if you want to stay near or at the hotel and Whole Foods around the corner.

title: Our Stay at Pendry Manhattan West
text: This is an excellent hotel that is conveniently located to the restaurants and shops at Hudson Yards. The rooms are very functional and well appointed. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We will definitely return to the Pendry.

title: Great Stay; discreet, luxurious, relaxing
text: I am not normally one to leave reviews but I had to after my stay. Celebrated a birthday and stayed with my wife. From start to finish we received impeccable service and hospitality. It was a staycation for us and by far the best hotel we have stayed in in NYC. The room felt like a private oasis of calm in the craziness of NYC. It was very zen, very comfortable, amazing bath products and everything was extremely considered. Definitely for guests looking for a high end, discreet but luxurious stay. Area is also great for walking and dining. Couldn't recommend the hotel enough and will be back as often as we can. BONUS: a Black Fox Coffee location just off the lobby. Win win.

title: Luxury and modern in great location
text: The Pendry is located in the Hudson Yards area of Manhattan. Location was perfect to walk most places or take a short cab ride. The only exception was to Central Park and museums near park. A taxi was sufficient but traffic jammed in that area.

title: Stay Here, You Won't Regret It
text: Can't say enough wonderful things about this place. The hotel is immaculate with incredible attention to detail. The staff is so welcoming and attentive. The room service food is incredible. The rooms are luxurious, quiet, and cozy. Really appreciated the nightly turn-down. Please consider this hotel if you are visiting NYC.

title: Pampered Luxury!!
text:
One of our best hotel experiences ever. Staff is effortlessly accommodating. Room was gorgeous!  Highly recommend. Would gladly stay there again. 
Location is great and close to nice parts of the city—very safe.

title: A gem in Hudson Yards
text: A new hidden gem in Hudson Yards - the Pendry is a great choice.  The staff are amazingly welcoming, the fitness center is a great size with new equipment - the rooms are comfy -  with nice bath products and the bar is hopping.  If you can get into the restaurant, it's great - but hard to get a rez. for dinner

title: Awesome new deluxe hotel!  Definately will come back!
text: This is my favorite hotel, perfect location, love the new modern spacious rooms and delicious food!  Perfection!  We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely return.  Our room was super well thought out, room service was quick and food was yummy.

title: Great NY hotel  on Highline!
text: Beautiful five star hotel but less costly than Ritz and quite frankly better. A more hip vibe. Room was a nice size with a killer view. Lobby beautiful and loved that we were 10 blocks from midtown and 10 blocks from West Village.

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: This hotel goes above and beyond to make sure you have everything you need for your stay. The service is extremely personalized and first class. I want to give a huge shout out to Luis at the front desk. He exemplifies amazing customer service. My stay wouldn’t have been the same without him.

title: Top!
text:
Stayed 8 nights. Top place! 
Perfectly located hotel with lots of restaurants and attractions nearby. Top class service from start to finish. especially good service at the door.
I can warmly recommend Pendry.

title: Best Hotel in Manhattan
text: This experience will remind you of what luxury travel once was. The entire experience from the time you arrive to when you depart will be a memorable and rewarding hotel stay. We loved this hotel because everything about it is Five Star. The level of personalized experience is unparalleled. Daniel Ng, the Manager should be commended for ensuring that every detail of your stay is top notch. The rooms are large and beautiful and this is a full service hotel with room service and other perks that are rare in today’s world of travel. Every staff person is welcoming and you are treated like royalty. We booked through American Express Fine Hotels which I also recommend. The amenities are wonderful!

title: A Memorable Manhattan Birthday
text:
A stay at the Pendry Manhattan West should be on top of everyone's list for a visit to New York City. Located  just a block and a half from Penn Station and Madison Square Garden, two blocks from the High Line and mere steps from Hudson Yards - it is the ideal base for your next Manhattan adventure. This may seem like it would be a noisy spot, but that could not be further from the truth. The Pendry is a quiet oasis in the middle of all that Manhattan has to offer.
When we arrived, we were greeted by Louis at the front desk. He was delightful and gave us great tips about experiences we might enjoy. We also told him that we were celebrating my birthday and he arranged for a birthday cake to be left in our room with a wonderful note. (See Photos) 
The rooms are beautifully furnished and every need was carefully considered. I needed to steam an evening jacket for a broadway performance and they had a steamer available in the closet. 
While the quality of the surroundings was top notch, it was the staff that made our stay so memorable. The morning we left, Naeemah and Deki  graciously found us an ideal breakfast spot near Central Park (our last stop before we flew home.)
The Pendry Manhattan West should not be missed.

title: Fabulous hotel
text: Top-shelf hotel, great staff, excellent location. The views from the upper floor rooms on the North side of the building are incredible. Zhou Zhous was very nice and so was bar Pendry. We look forward to trying other Pendry locations

title: Wonderful first experience at Pendry
text: I had an excellent, enjoyable stay at Pendry Manhattan West.  From the moment I entered the hotel, the service, front desk personnel, and other staff were very accommodating, helpful and informative. I hope to stay at the Pendry for future business opportunities, perhaps bringing my spouse in the future.

title: Excellent hotel and location
text: We chose the Pendry because we have stayed at the Pendry in Baltimore. We also wanted a hotel that was close to the train station and Hudson Yards. Excellent service provided by all staff members and the hotel is very comfortable.

title: Can’t wait to come back
text: The rooms here are next level and luxurious, especially in comparison to many of the rooms at comparable hotels in NYC. Location, location, location is spot on! Couldn’t ask for a better location in NYC and so fun to walk around and explore. Easily will come back!

title: Amazing Stay!
text: Great property, excellent location, friendly service! If you want to treat yourself to a special experience, look no further than the Pendry Manhattan West. My 16yo daughter and I planned a trip to NYC for her spring break. We loved being steps from Penn Station, The High Line, and Hudson Yards. We also  appreciated returning to our beautiful and quiet room after being out and about all day, The Pendry exemplifies modern luxury. The rooms were extremely comfortable and decorated with modern, simple and sylish charm. Service was perfect. They exceeded all expectations. We will definitely be back!

title: Great experience
text: It is a beautiful hotel, and the rooms, amenities, and staff exceeded our expectations.  The staff was warm and accommodating, we used the fitness center and restaurant and all was excellent.  The location was perfect and we hope to get back soon.

title: A Weekend of Luxury
text: We felt pampered from the moment we set foot in the hotel. Excellent service, excellent amenities, excellent location. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a soul-cleansing vacation. The best trip we've had in a long time!

title: NYC weekend at Pendry
text:
Beautiful, clean, comfortable accommodations. Great convenient location. Staff was efficient and helpful. 
John at front desk and Kelly in sales went out of their way for our family. We will look forward to another weekend in the future.

title: Highly recommend
text: Overall great stay at the Pendry. Clean, friendly staff, and in a great location. We enjoyed our stay and would go back. The only drawback is they do not have valet which was a bit of an inconvenience but everything else was great.

title: Great location and high quality throughout
text: We stayed here based on reviews and were not disappointed. The hotel itself was very well presented, and provided a comfortable base from which to do all our sightseeing. It is situated well in mid Manhattan, and provides good accessibility to the subway and the rest of Manhattan.   Juan in particular, from the concierge and bell team, was an absolute star and always provided service with a smile and was able to guides us around navigating this busy city, and always had answers to our questions.

title: Excellent!!!!!!!
text:
Amazing from the door to my room. Good job Pendry NYC. 
The rooms are spacious and they are not outrgeous in price. It’s luxury feels and 5 star hotel hospitality. The staff was amazing. I would recommend them over and over.

title: Fantastic Stay
text: First time staying at a Pendry and the cleanliness and comfort was over the top. The turndown service before bed made me feel even more welcomed. Bar was great, breakfast spot was pretty poor service but the food was good

title: Wonderful Hotel
text: Beautiful Hotel. Rooms and amenities are really great. Staff is wonderful! I will definitely be coming back. Location is great, close to lots of restaurants, shops and highline walking park. The hotel restaurant Zou Zou’s was wonderful too.

title: Friest Stay but not the last
text: This hotel was very impressive, in all areas. Made you feel welcomed and looked after. I will, not only will return to this location, but will look out for all the locations when making a travel plans.

title: Comfort, Style and Service on the Westside
text: Pendry Manhattan West is fantastic in every way. It is located in Hudson Yards, a new development in Manhattan's West Side, between the Chelsea and Hell's Kitchen neighborhoods. Lots of fantastic restaurants and shops are within easy walking distance.    Access to public transportation is a few blocks away, including Penn Station. The bell and front desk staff got to know us right away and we felt like we were coming and going from our home. We stayed in 2 room types; Deluxe City King and Corner Studio Suite. Due to the curve of the exterior walls, the Deluxe City King had a sitting area up against the floor to ceiling windows, which made the room larger than the average hotel room. The bathroom in the Suite included a soaking tub, double vanity with drawers, shower room w/both a rain shower and hand held shower. The sitting area in the Suite was in the Corner of the room and was very spacious. The design style is clean, bright, warm and comfortable. Both rooms had plenty of drawers and closets. Toiletries are in refillable dispensers which reduces waste. Black Fox Coffee is right next door and offers fantastic coffee and a well chosen assortment of fresh baked pastries. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Gorgeous stay, super close to everything
text: We had a super easy stay at the Pendry.  It was a convenient location from Penn Station, and a very easy walk to Hudson Yards and Javits for my convention.  It was on a quieter stretch and it was on a clean/peaceful block.  It was $$$$$ but worth the stay.

title: Natural Perfection
text:
Hotel walks the fine line of paying attention to you without everything feeling fussy.  Staff are friendly and authentic.  The hotel style blends cool influences from California, Japan and Scandinavia (at least to my eye).
This is my second time to stay in their hotels in a month and I absolutely love them.

title: Amazing
text: Pendry M.H was a great experience for me. The team is lead by a great leader. This hotel will be success for the future. Everyone understands there job and does it the best. I can't wait to take things I learned to Pendry d.c

title: Very good Experience
text: Great location with very friendly staff.  Thanks for Daniel and his team for making sure I am very comfortable stay.  They made sure, I got checked in, got the room that I needed, help me with my luggage and bags.  Made sure everything was OK.

title: SPECTACULAR in every way
text:
From the time we checked in and were greeted with a welcome refreshing drink and a personal greeting by the manager, we felt at home. The room, the location, the food, and cocktails, couldn't have been more terrific (special shout out to Bar Pendry and Zou Zou's!). The service was so personal, without being obtrusive. The hotel staff knew us by name (we stayed five nights), and made sure to acknowledge us each time they saw us. 

It was cold when we were in town, so when we'd go out to wait on our car service, the doormen would  come and offer to wait for us, so that we could stay warm in the lobby. It was these extra touches that sets Pendry Manhattan West apart from most other NYC hotels. It will definitely be our home-away-from home when visiting our daughter at college in NYC.  Thank you to the entire Pendry team for such a fantastic stay!!

title: Luxury Stay That Didn't Disappoint
text: From arrival to departure, the staff and the level of service we received was impeccable. I booked this hotel for my husband's birthday trip and we absolutely loved it. the accommodations were top notch and I can't say enough about the staff. They were all so warm and welcoming. Every aspect of this hotel did not disappoint. We will absolutely stay here again. And will be staying at more Pendry hotels as we travel.

title: Elegant, Upscale, Quiet, and Well Located New Hotel
text: This Hudson Yards area hotel was selected after reading about its facilities and the many 5 star reviews.  We were delighted by our stay will definitely return.  The room was well designed, spacious (for NYC), and quiet.  We heard little to no street noise.  It is located near all the activities in Hudson Yards, as well as having easy walking access to the subway.  When we needed an Uber to get somewhere, they were always only a few minutes away.  Every person at this hotel was friendly and welcoming.  We also enjoyed the bar there.  Next time, we will try one of their restaurants.

title: Great stay for a business trip
text: Loved my brief stay at Pendry Manhattan West. I was impressed that they honored my requests for foam pillows and a yoga mat without my having to ask on check-in. The digital baggage tag system at the front desk was an efficient way to store bags while I waited for my room to be ready. We had great cocktails at Bar Pendry (be sure to try their Spicy Margarita) and room service breakfast was a treat. Everyone I encountered was warm, hospitable and willing to go out of their way to help. Will be back!

title: Special property for a special celebration
text: One of the hotel's suites was a perfect treat for a family celebration.  The spacious floor plan, luxury amenities and hotel team's excellent hospitality made for an memorable visit.  The hotel even arranged for some family photos to be on the table in the room to make the celebration feel personal.  We will certainly return on trips to NYC.

title: New favorite hotel in Manhattan
text: Wish I could give this hotel more than 5 stars! The location is amazing and within walking distance of the best restaurants and shops. The hotel was so great we barely wanted to go explore anywhere else. The hotel bar and restaurant are outstanding. The rooms were luxurious and had so many great features I’ve never seen in any other hotels. The staff was friendly, accommodating and everyone went above and beyond to make our stay memorable.

title: The only way to experience Manhattan at night
text:
After staying here for an overnight layover, I'm convinced there's no other place to go to experience the glamor of Manhattan. I'll never stay anywhere else. 

From the detailed interiors to the professional warmth of the staff, Pendry Manhattan was a delight at every turn during our very short stay. We were on our way to a tropical resort the next day and still had to drag ourselves out of our beautiful suite. I will be back and hopefully soon.

title: I will be back!
text: I must say I loved the Pendry! The room layout was so smart. Books in the room, great in-room bar, loved the shower. The restaurant has a great vibe, great food, it really complements the hotel. Hope to get back in the warmer weather and check out the roof!

title: The place to be
text: The Pendry is one of those places you absolutely need to experience. They deliver  on service in such a way the Ritz, better watch out. The Pendry is in town and they are commanding attention, I am so glad I was there!

title: Another wonderful stay...
text: Walking through the front door of the lobby never gets old. It's beautiful and well kept. The rooms are all exquisite. Comfortable, handsome and well designed. Lovely amenities at the hotel. The location is close to a Whole Foods and a collection of high-end shopping.

title: Fantastic boutique hotel
text: We loved this hotel in Chelsea, conveniently located, friendly helpful staff and delicious food,. All requests were handled quickly with ease and all employees were well trained and versed in excellent customer service.

title: Favorite place to stay in NYC
text: Very impressed with the outstanding level of hospitality and service offered at the Pendry Manhattan West. It is a perfect hotel to revitalize after a busy day. The amenities and food are top-notch. It is my favorite place to stay in NYC!

title: Special experience
text: We treat ourselves to the Pendry when visiting the NY Now gift show. We say it’s convenient to the Javitz but it’s an excuse to be pampered there!  The rooms are beautiful, the beds so comfortable and the service impeccable. We always eat there too. The food in the bar is delicious so there’s no need to leave the property.

title: Night in the City
text: Exceptional spot, great location ,able to enjoy the walk to shows, dining, shops and attractions. It even has an adjacent beautiful Ice Skating Rink. Classy in a non pretentious way and the effort by staff to create a comfortable stay is quickly noted. Staff professional and attentive. Highly recommend.

title: Superb
text: Great location, friendly staff and beautiful property. Highly recommend. Restaurants are both very good.  Location is great - near the highline and Hudson Yards. Looking at the Pendry in Chicago for our next trip.

title: Thank you
text: Wanted to thank you all. The only sleep complaint was there was some sort of construction going on above us that woke me up. That's the reason I didn't give you a perfect sleep score. All in all we all had an amazing time!

title: Weekend NYC trip
text: The Pendry Manhattan West was a great place to stay for us and our family.  We felt so comfortable and safe at the Pendry.  Great location, walking distance to so much and just a short cab ride to more.  I felt very close to everything but also enough away from the hustle and bustle of the big city.  We all slept peacefully, I’m generally sensitive to outside city noises, and was not bothered by any.  The staff was so helpful and friendly.  I highly recommend the Pendry.  We can’t wait to come back!

title: Close Comfort!
text: If you are visiting the Javits Centre or Hudson Yards this is the place to stay. Very comfortable hotel with great/new bedrooms and great staff. The rooms aren't massive but you get a big bed (very comfortable with high quality bedding) and a massive TV. The lighting is high end (Lutron) and you get a great mini bar and Nespresso machine (with capsules). Wifi is free and so is bottled house water. No bath in my room but large walk-in high powered shower.

title: Great vacation
text: The staff was excellent. They were very helpful. The rooms were spacious and clean. It was wonderful. I completely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a easy and pleasurable experience in NYC. My children loved it as well.

title: Pendry Manhatten West
text: Thank You Pendry for an amazing unforgettable weekend getaway, My girlfriend and I spent are first weekend away together and it was so magical, relaxing and special thanks to everyone at Pendry Manhatten West! We both lost our spouses a few years ago unfortunately, so this was some much needed Quality time together. Thank you again to everyone at Pendry for making us feel so welcome, comfortable and relaxed! We will be back and look foward towards experiencing other Pendry locations.

title: Eat Like Your In The Mediterranean
text:
Located in the epicenter of Manhattan's West Side, encompassed by a jaw-smashing, surfs-up wave exterior, sits the West Coast inspired, Pendry Manhattan West.

I relished in my Deluxe City King with floor to ceiling windows sporting a city view. A cozy sitting area butted up to a windowed alcove provided a homey ambience to the surroundings. The room was outfitted with swanky wood furniture and other accoutrements as well as a bevy of high-tech room appliances. The bathroom was marbleized with a walk-in shower.

The Pendry is a culinary oasis that boasts 4 unique food venues including the Zou Zou eatery, the Chez Zou lounge, the Bar Pendry and the Garden Room. The signature Zou Zou is a Eastern Mediterranean restaurant with a medley of food fare from Turkey, Israel, Jordan and other countries. I sucked down choice oysters, worked through a myriad of dips and flavors, savored smoked lamp chops and enjoyed the live fire Mediterranean cooking bonanza.

Pendry features a 24/7, 1700 sq. ft. fitness center which amply took care of my exercise needs.

So, if you want to stay in Luxe surroundings steps from Hudson Yards and garnish outstanding fine dining..........................then try the.................Pendry Manhattan West..............................Eat Like Your In The Mediterranean.

title: The  quietest hotel in New York
text:
The Pendry was incredible. Wonderful staff that constantly went above and beyond. The doormen were particularly attentive. 

Peaceful lobby, and an incredible location. The rooms are the quietest that I’ve ever experienced in New York. No sounds  of traffic, sirens, garbage trucks. Silence. 

We usually use the executive lounge where we stay, Pendry does not offer one, however the Garden room proved better. Quiet, empty and full service. A great place to hang out and relax. 

The location is superb, between Hudson Yards and Pen Station. Next time I’ll splurge on larger rooms.

title: Amazing experience at the Pendry! Highly recommend
text: The Pendry hotel experience from check in to check out was absolutely seamless and a wonderful stay. We thoroughly enjoyed all of the little details, starting with Juan upon arrival - he was so kind, helpful and thoughtful. Every time we came back to the hotel he asked specific questions about our day or night before that he remembered us mentioning that we were doing. It really felt like "home" while we were there. The hotel is centrally located, clean, gorgeous rooms/decor, comfortable bed, amazing sunset view from our room, well appointed with everything we needed. Room service was wonderful and Josh made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. Absolutely loved staying at the Pendry and can't wait to come back!

title: Amazing stay! Beautiful hotel!
text: Amazing hotel!!!!! Still has some room for improvement but it was amazing! The hotel and room are very nicely appointed, a nice amenity was set at our arrival as well. I enjoyed the bed very much, also the shower! The room was a bit smaller than what we had in mind but we liked it! There is not much space to unpack, the closet is tiny! The service was good, even though we sometimes felt like it is a self service kind of hotel, leaning more to business-like. For the price paid, I would encourage the service to be more present... But overall had an amazing four days, the location is exceptional!

title: Understated luxury in the heart of Manhattan
text: The Pendry is truly an oasis in the middle of NYC – my wife and I had a short yet amazing stay there and from the moment of arrival and the way the staff greeted us, we were blown away as service was unlike anywhere else. More than luxury, the Pendry is truly a one of a kind hospitality experience – the staff is kind and gracious, making it feel like you're staying at a friend's beautiful place. The lobby feels extremely intimate, warm, and inviting, while the rooms and view of the city are absolutely stunning. Location is very close to Hudson Yards and connect to Manhattan West, which has plenty of retail and dining options, as well as a convenient Whole Foods. Overall, a great stay and look forward to visiting again soon!

title: Stay here because there is NO better hotelin ALL of Manhattan! Plus it's close to everywhere you want to be. Guaranteed!
text:
We stayed for New Years Eve and it was fabulous indeed! Got upgraded to an even more fabulous corner suite. Immaculate. Roomy. Luxurious. Whole hotel smells like it's brand new and looks it too. Great service from every facet. Wonderful turndown service and room service and fulfillment of needs  (ice, Champagne glasses, silverware, slippers  - fast and immaculate!!!) Probably never had better service anywhere. My kinda used experience. Will always stay here in future. Above par for hotel and I am truly a stickler to be honest.

You won't be sorry - believe me.

The only issue that stood out was valet garage was t working so no valet service currently.  Will probably be fixed soon in 2023. But they do direct toa gars erythromycin one that will valet overnight for around $45 per 24 hour period. It's safe and close. They do stress 24 hours exactly tho. If over that, you will be charged for a second day, so be aware.

title: Best hotel experience ever
text: Simply the best. We stayed for 2 days and wished it was for 10. Great hotel and excellent customer service. Every employee went out of their way to ensure we felt comfortable and pampered. Looking forward to the next stay!!

title: Very Comfy and quiet hotel
text: If you have the budget, this is the place to stay in Hudson yard area. The hotel is right next to the mall and the parking was close enough. I parked at the MPG at 30th street but it only took me 5 min to walk back to the hotel, faster if I cut through the wholefood The only down side is they do not offer valet parking.

title: The Perfect Getaway
text: Pendry Manhattan West is situated in the perfect location for the perfect Christmas weekend in NYC! Actually...any weekend at any time of the year! The staff at Pendry know exactly what to do to make all guests feel special.

title: great holiday stay
text: we stayed for a holiday vacation.  the location is fantastic and the hotel and staff were great. we were always able to catch an uber right outside the hotel and the hotel is so calming and warm.  the double beds are a little small, but comfortable.  a whole foods and foodcourt are steps away

title: Beautiful hotel in a great location if you want to be a bit outside of the madness
text: I visited for a business trip and had a wonderful stay.  The staff is very friendly and the decor warm and inviting.  I like the fact that this hotel is a bit outside of the chaos of Manhattan during the holidays and just a few blocks from  Hudson Yards and the very impressive Vessel.

title: 100 out of 10!
text:
Excuisite. Gorgeous. Amazing. Refined.  We heard all the buzz, read the reviews, saw first hand at times from a distance but finally had the opportunity to stay.  No further words can describe how amazing our stay was.

The experience at the Pendry is unmatched.

title: The best rooms and location!!!
text: Flight got delayed and had to stay an extra night in Manhattan. Decided to stay by Hudson Yards and The Pendry was an amazing choice! Excellent room and decor. Super beautiful bathroom and verrry comfortable bed and view out room was lovely! Will definitely stay again.

title: Excellent Customer Service
text: The Pendry staff made us feel very welcome through our stay and made everything very convenient for us. The customer service was outstanding. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. I felt very welcome and comfortable through out my stay. I will definitely be back!

title: Wonderful Experience
text: This property is beautiful & the staff are fantastic!  Can't wait to come back. I can't say enough about how perfect our stay was.  We traveled from Australia and this was our first stop and a great intro to America.

title: The perfect mix
text: Came to NY for business, but also stayed through the weekend to visit friends and enjoy the city.  Was able to book a suite to conduct my meetings which offered a living room w/TV for presentations and a dining room which made for a great atmosphere but still allowed for overall privacy.  It never felt like you were in someones guest room, but more like someones house, but with all the service and amenities you would expect from a Montage or Pendry.  The hotel is perfect situated next  door to Moynihan Station, so you can arrive by LIRR and have direct access to ACE to get around the city.  Unless I am staying with friends, I wouldn't stay anywhere else.

title: Excellence from Top to Bottom
text: The title says it all. From the moment you pull up to the hotel, the flawless experience of your stay begins. The bell service is second to none and the staff is friendly. The rooms are well appointed and offer tons of amenities. I would stay here again any time I make a trip to NYC!

title: Great West Side Hotel
text: Great brand and quality that is consistent across locations. The building and hotel were new. The design and room layouts were really great for four of us to stay organized in a double room. Keep up the good work Pendry team.

title: Great Weekend Getaway
text: From the moment we entered the Pendry we were treated with kindness and respect. We checked in easily and were shown to our beautiful room. The hotel is located near Hudson Yard which was a very fun place to explore, dine and shop. We were able to walk to many bars ,shops, parks, also close to many metro stations and a few blocks from Penn Station and Madison Square Garden  We ordered room service. It came quickly and was delicious. The staff was incredibly helpful and nice with every interaction. Kenneth at the front desk was especially kind and professional. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to NYC

title: Fabulous location and rooms, great service
text: We stayed just one night at the Pendry and had a great experience.  What we loved about it is easy access to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden, Hudson Yards, Whole Foods and a close by subway stop which connects you throughout the city.  The room was well appointed, comfortable and quiet.  The staff at the front door and the checkin were friendly, efficient and helpful.  We will definitely return.

title: A Stay to Remember
text: The Pendry is one of the best hotels I have ever had the pleasure of visiting.  The rooms are spacious and immaculate.  The staff is exceedingly gracious, and the entire environ is spectacular.  Can't wait to visit again!

title: Checked all the boxes
text: Beautiful midsize hotel, exceptional staff, great location. Right across from the new Hudson Yards so there are lots of restaurants and shops within a very short walk. Zou Zou, The Pendry’s in-house restaurant was very good. Bar Pendry was fun and Black Fox Coffee, which was right outside the front entrance was very good!

title: Outstanding Experience
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Pendry Manhattan West recently to celebrate my wife's birthday. I connected with the General Manager in advance to make special arrangements for my wife since our stay was a surprise for her. Shortly after checking in, we were delighted with the wine, cake, and chocolate which was brought to our room, all of which was excellent. Everyone at the hotel was kind, thoughtful, and quick to assist or answer questions. The room itself was terrific - spacious, well-appointed, exceptionally clean, and very quiet. We had heard many wonderful things about this property, and it definitely lived up to our expectations in every respect. We look forward to returning again the next time we are in town.

title: Amazing!
text: Incredible location, food at ZouZous was outstanding, drinks in Bar Pendry were perfect, from the moment we walked through the door until we left I felt unparalleled hospitality! So many associates addressed me by name, the genuine care I felt when talking to Daniel made me want to stay longer! I am already planning another weekend getaway!

title: Put the Pendry down as a must stay in Manhattan.
text:
I had not been to Manhattan since May 2019.  News stories about crime and other issues had created some apprehension about visiting,

Those stories could not be further from reality.
