The Pendry is located at Manhattan West, which honestly, is probably the best area of the city now, among many great areas.

The hotel is a 10, the staff is amazing, from front desk to housekeeping.  Astoundingly good restaurant on the main level and excellent bar scene.

The fitness center is among the best I’ve ever experienced.

(There is a little engineering issue with restaurant exhaust that needs to be worked out - minor irritant)

Pendry had to be a top option when seeking a luxury accommodation in an area with quick access to subways and other mean of getting around.  Brilliant.

title: The Perfect Stay
text: Every aspect of this hotel was the perfect blend of luxury, style, and coziness. The decor and design of the hotel are stunning, the room was beautiful, bed and linens were so comfortable... I could not have hoped for a better stay. We enjoyed in-room breakfast on our last day in NY, and Choephel delivered our food promptly, perfectly, and was such a joy to talk to. I would recommend this hotel to anyone --- You won't be disappointed!

title: Best stay in NY
text:
Elegant hotel in a modern luxurious setting in Hudson Yards near a new upscale mall, the Highline and the Edge.  

We had 2 side by side rooms for our family of 5 adults. Staff were warm and friendly (Kenny deserves special mention!).  Loved his hotel!

title: WOW
text: I will sing this hotels praises constantly! From the moment I stepped in it was a delight! All of the staff were absolutely wonderful and not to mention the most exquisite rooms and service. From the amazing bath products to the perfectly curated amenities this hotel deserves all 5 stars!

title: Gorgeous Understated Luxury In Manhattan
text: This beautiful hotel in the new Manhattan West complex has a modern, residential style that says luxury but does it quietly. The staff is welcoming. Zou Zou's restaurant has a buzzy atmosphere with great food. Location - very close to Hudson Yards, the Highline and Penn Station - is great.

title: Excellent escape - Felt welcomed and Pammpered
text: Our experience at the Pendry Manhattan West was outstanding. From check in to check out we felt welcomed, special and pampered. Juan went out of his way to make our stay extra enjoyable. We highly recommend this property.

title: Terrible location for premium room
text: Had a deluxe rm for our 24th anniversary. Rm was situated directly across from a housekeeping closet that was accessed more then frequently. This opening & closing of the loud solid core door kept us awake & even  startled as it sounded like someone was opening our own door.

title: Amazing is an understatement
text:
Okay. So I have been in some amazing hotels. All over the world. Pendry Manhattan West is absolutely at the top. John was amazing. He let us know we had an upgrade available so our stay was extra wonderful! We stayed in the One Bedroom Skyline View. The guy in the coffee shop was also so nice! I loved how the team knew our names when walking around the property and even asked us about our Broadway show! How they can remember these details is beyond me. But Pendry is now my go to. Especially in Manhattan but opened my eyes to this hotel chain-so I can't wait to explore the other properties!!
Oh-and we walked from Penn Station it was so fast! It's so quaint and quiet in the middle of the city. There's a Whole Foods right there as well. The entire property was so clean. I can go on and on about my experience but my mother and I are both just so impressed with this hotel!

title: Mid Centrury Elegance and Tranquility
text: I work in TV and travel across the country. My company usually puts me up with our talent in the nicest hotels in each city. The Pendry is far and away one of my favorite hotels I've ever stayed in. It's calm design and mid century modern feel epitomize elegance and comfort. Always excited to stay in the Pendry.

title: Outstanding hotel
text: Spacious, quiet, modern accommodations and an entire staff who truly care about their customers. Two blocks from Penn Station with several dining options within steps of the hotel in the Manhattan West and Hudson Yards area. There is a terrific fitness center in the hotel as well. I would definitely stay here again whenever in NYC.

title: Good but Improvement on Some Basics Needed
text: Stayed 3 nights in late September. Relatively new hotel with high end design located close to Hudson Yards and High Line. Really attentive and welcoming staff. Amenity/Transition areas of the hotel are quite compact and seating around reception can get quite busy. Rooms are extremely well furnished and beds comfortable. Rooms have separate shower and toilet areas but the shower wasnt particularly hot. Our main gripe was most of the rooms are arranged around quite a tight lift core and despite being new the lifts appeared quite noisy and in need of a bit of maintnenace. Everytime somebody exited through the night you could hear the lift squeaking and dinging away which isnt particularly condusive to a good nights sleep. The hotel is located in an area of new office developments so the bars and restaurants always seemed quite busy and quite buzzy. We did however get refused entry to the 4th floor roof terrace one evening because of a drinks event. Its not particularly good when you seem to be prioritising non staying guests over staying ones particularly when you are charging circa £750 per night. All in all the hotel has potential but some of the basics informaing a good stay need addressing.

title: Best in the Business
text: The Pendry was magical!  The staff makes you feel at home and the facility is comfortable and luxurious. They expected my arrival and were ready to receive me despite being early.  The room was spectacular, if not for the many entertainment venues in the hotel I might have not left my room.

title: Zen in New York
text: The Pendry is in a great location with quiet surroundings and close to the High line and the Hudson yards.  The staff are warm, kind and caring, we felt safe in the neighbourhood.  The rooms are spacious, great view, amazing comfortable beds, - we loved the experience and really appreciated the thought to make your stay more comfortable.

title: Great experience
text: Outstanding service by all staff members.  Bed was soooo comfy!  Convenient location for Hi Line, Hudson Yards, Vessel, train station.  The fitness center was well equipped and immaculate.  I would do it again.

title: Luxe and relaxing birthday weekend stay
text:
Such an incredible stay at Pendry Manhattan West! My boyfriend and I stayed there to celebrate his birthday and the team there made it such a special experience. The room was immaculate with beautiful views of the city. The bed was so comfortable and the room design and layout was welcoming and comfortable. The hotel was centrally located in Hudson Yards and was close to a ton of shopping and dining.

The staff at both the hotel and the restaurants in the hotel were so friendly and helpful (shoutout to David who helped us with our bags upon arrival.)

Highly recommend considering this hotel for your next trip to NYC!

title: Best Hotel in the new Epicenter of Manhattan: Midtown West
text: Having lived in NYC years ago, arriving at the Pendry is like visiting a new city. To say nothing of the fact that you are steps from the coolest new restaurants and shops, within walking distance of Broadway, Madison Square Garden, and Rockefeller Center, when you step into the Pendry you are enveloped in an oasis of glamour and comfort that is simultaneously relaxing and invigorating. Best bed and bathroom in a luxury hotel by the way!

title: The best in NYC
text: My new home in NYC! The staff and support were amazing. The restaurant and bar were great. If you want to feel like you are home the Pendry Manhattan is where you want to stay. I have been traveling to NY for 30 years. Now I have a home.

title: Great stay
text: Very nice hotel. Value was average. Ignored initially upon arrive for ~10 minutes, which was fine, we are patient. Brought up to our room by bellhop/doorman. Employee knocked and entered room 3 seconds after the knock. Luckily we were dressed, but weird they just entered- we were on our way to answer the door. Hours of the bar and dining options are limited. In room dining was average- a few items were not available. All in all this is a great hotel, I just add in all the specific details with the hope they continue to improve and provide even more exceptional service to others!

title: Great Find near Penn Station
text: Stayed at the Pendry for trip out for USOpen.  So happy with the choice.  Rooms were very comfortable and clean and above average size for NYC.  Everyone in the lobby, from check-in to bellman to everyone else just hanging around looking to be helpful were so friendly and cheerful.  And location next to Penn Station and far away from Time Square was just perfect.  Highly recommend.

title: Séjour agréable
text: cet hôtel est très bien placé, dans un quartier neuf et propre. Il y a pleins de restaurants et magasins autour, le métro est aussi tout près, quelques minutes à pieds. Les personnels d'hôtel sont sympas et serviables. Notre chambre était propre et spacieuse, aussi très calme. On a bien dormi.

title: Comfort, service in prime location
text: We thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of this hotel. It is located close to dining, shopping at Hudson Yards, the Vessel, subway, the High Line and Hudson River. The rooms are very quiet, we had excellent service from all staff and the rooms are very well equipped with large TV, umbrella, steamer, nespresso machine, mini-bar, complimentary macaroons & water with turn down service. Welcomed by staff each & every time we walked in.

title: Pendry Manhattan West,
text:
It is almost impossible for a hotel to  score 5-STARS on all counts...but the Pendry Manhattan West absolutely does!  

The location is PERFECT.   If traveling from NJ via the Lincoln Tunnel, once you exit the tunnel, you are almost there.  This is especially great if you're not a fan of tedious Manhattan traffic before reaching your destination.  I'll be honest, back in the day, this area used to be a bit dodgy (sandwiched out between Hell's Kitchen and Chelsea), but it has now been redeveloped into a Swanky, Safe and Clean little pocket of Midtown Manhattan Heaven! Hudson Yards is just a block away with fabulous sites, shopping, restaurants and beauty salons.  

The Staff is PERFECT.  So welcoming, kind,  helpful, resourceful, respectful and discreet.  No judge zone here, and everyone goes the extra mile to make sure your stay is as comfortable as it can possibly be.  I will not begin naming everyone who I had the pleasure of meeting, as this will take up at least 500 more characters on this page - but you know who you are :)) !!  Thank you for making my 2 stays here so incredibly perfect!

What else.  The Amenities are just FABULOUS.  From the Restaurant to the Bar with the kindest Waitstaff, to the beautiful Fitness Center with magnificent High Line and NYC views.  

And then the Rooms.  OMG, the views are ridiculous, the beds are oh-so comfortable (not too hard, not too soft, just right), the bathrooms gorgeous with fabulous designer toiletries out of pump bottles, rather than the annoying little throw aways in the shower (because you can't get anything out of them).  At night during turn down, there are delicious little macarons nestled on your pillowcase, and there is always tons of really good bottled water, so you don't have to dip into the mini bar. 

Last but probably 'a quite important' for many .... AMAZING lighting and mirrors.  This does so much for your esteem to know as long as you wake up, stay, and go to bed here, you will look glowing, refreshed and a tad more slender than your usual.  Haha!  Big smile.  You can also change the lighting to daytime, evening, etc.in the bathrooms, and this is great for makeup application for those who wear make up.  They really nailed it with this one.  

Love, love, love the Pendry Manhattan West and everyone who works there!  I can't wait to return!  <3

title: Business networking trip
text: Location near everything and everything to come. Young opera star bartending. Incredibly welcoming and accommodating staff everywhere. Guestrooms are great size with all needs met including books that are hard not to pick up and skim through. Great NYC turndown music, too.

title: An incredibly hotel stay!
text: We love Pendry hotels, this is the third one we have stayed at in recent years, they were all excellent but this particular hotel, its location, decor, amenities and guest services made it our favorite hotel stay period. Staying here is true luxury, but at the same time it has a very "homey" and relaxed feel to it. Its location is terrific, easy access to what Manhattan has to offer but away from the busiest parts of town. Yes, its pricey, but in return they offer an outstanding environment.

title: Quick trip
text: A 24 hour trip was made seamless by every human working at Pendry MW during my stay. I really liked the location. The food was great and the hotel is beautiful, perfectly in New York style. Anxious to return.

title: Understated luxury
text: Located right in the heart of Hudson Yards, walking distance to shopping, many dining options, and if you are a Pelaton member the studio is right there so book a class in advance!  If interested in sight seeing, The Edge is only a block away.  The Pendry is centrally located to it all. The Scandinavian designed rooms are elevated with lux for maximum comfort, no detail spared. Courteous staff, trendy bar and restaurant on site. I would definitely recommend and certainly visit again.

title: Great New Spot
text: Clean and Appears new.  Staff is wonderful and location is perfect for Madison Square events.  Misael was exceptionally welcoming and helpful.  Pricey but very comfortable and quiet. Highline stars here and worth the walk! The Vessel was close but closed for security reasons.  Edge Bar (triangle on the top of 40 Hudson Yard Wes fun, but lines were long and cost $100 for 2.

title: My new favorite NY hotel
text: Pendry Manhattan West is my new favorite hotel in NY!  You absolutely nailed the understated luxury and California cool.  The room design is beautiful and functional, the views and location near Hudson Yards are perfection.  The staff exudes genuine personalized hospitality—Juan the bellhop greeted me by name with bottled water every time I left or returned and the Brooklyn chocolate bar amenity made my day.  I also appreciate the price point for Pendry brand.  My sister works for Four Seasons resorts so we usually stay in their properties, but I have no desire to pay thousands per night for a room in NY when I’m out in the city!  We plan to stay at Pendry in Park City next!

title: Amazing property
text: Awesome property in a great location. Boutique high end style. Very nice rooms very comfortable, wood mill work and trim throughout the property were very nice and well done. Definitely recommend this one!

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: This is the best hotel in NYC. The service quality, the building and amenities, cleanliness, EVERYTHING. The dinner at Zou Zou was incredible...everything we ordered was the best version of the food I've ever had. We can't stop talking about it!

title: Best of NYC!
text: One of the best hotel experiences in the city thanks to the staff. I’ve never experienced a hotel where everyone seemed to go above and beyond. It’s a beautiful hotel and a great location but we will be returning because of the exemplary staff!

title: Great hotel and service!
text:
The service level at this hotel is amazing and everyone we met was so helpful and kind!  Ms. Menawi went above and beyond to make sure our stay was the very best. Sasha, Juan and the rest of the staff make sure you always have exactly what you need when you need it. 
My wife has a dog allergy and with the help of Ms. Menawi and housekeeping they made sure the room was perfect for our stay and we had no issues. 
As for the location we enjoyed the plaza directly behind the hotel with the restaurants and Whole Foods for anything we needed. The high line and Hudson yards are just a few blocks away so we took advantage of that being so close. 
Thank you for the wonderful stay and we look forward to seeing you next time.

title: Manhattan West comes alive!!
text: A wonderful stay on every point!  I stayed at the Pendry, Manhattan West just a few days shy of it's first anniversary.  The hotel is well done, guest rooms are well thought out and nicely accessorized.  The bath was perfect - no complaints.  ZouZou was hopping with a fun crowd and the food was yummy.  Stay here whenever you are in the neighborhood.

title: A really good place to stay
text: A excellent new property, eager to please staff and interesting position in a rapidly developing location. The precinct is being developed and will eventually link up with the High Line. Lots of good places to eat in the general area and within walking distance.

title: Highly recommend
text: Everything about the Pendry elevated my trip. They listened, they cared, and they did any little thing they could to improve every moment of my stay with them. Highly recommend the Pendry for any New York trip - they did not disappoint for even a second!

title: Beat hotel in NYC
text: This is an amazing property in the perfect location with the compliment of an amazing staff who are articulate in the art of making you feel at home. This hotel is in the perfect proximity of all of the local attractions and there is an abundance of great food locally.

title: Amazing Stay
text:
I stayed at Pendry MW and I had a very good time! I was surprised for the service and the daily amenities that I found in my room. The architecture design as well the decor are really off the chart! Jhon from FD did it caring for detailed service, Sasha, the door man, was on top!
There´s no doubt I'll book my next visit in NYC in this beautiful property, see you next time!

title: Loved our stay here
text: Room was so nice and the staff was very welcoming. Happy to recommend this hotel to anyone. We really enjoyed our stay. The location was perfect. Right next to Hudson Yard. Short walk to Chelsea market and a Wholefoods next door.

title: Treat yo'self!
text:
We live in Ditmas Park, Brooklyn but our home was undergoing some work. The first stay was purely unexpected and we needed a place where I felt comfortable, last minute. On a gut feeling I booked The Pendry and the rest, as they say, is history!
It's become our second home. 
Everything is top of the line and I freaking love it.
It's on the pricey side, but you feel it in every single thing. The location.  The room layout,  the comfortable bed, the staff, the cleanliness, the professionalism wrapped in friendly warmth. Room service. The attentiveness.
The yummy refreshing specialty drink in the lobby for your taking (I'll admit, I may have helped myself to it a bit, but eh it's my home away from home). The herb fires!
The hubs and I were extremely WELL cared for. 
I love this place.
I'm pretty sure they'll be seeing me soon a couple more times before the year is out.
Well done Pendry Manhattan West.
Don't EVER change!

title: Great Hotel and Customer Service.
text: If you have never stayed at a Pendry hotel it is a must you do so. Not only is the decor beautiful, but the customer service is outstanding. The bell service, doorman and front desk agents show that they truly care about their guests. I would definitely book again.

title: Highly recommended
text: Pendry fits all of your NYC needs. Shopping mall one block, Vessel one block away, Restaurants one block away. Since street is one-way it is easier to read your Uber/Lyft plate. Clean room and warm welcoming. Truly a elegant experience.

title: EXCEPTIONAL EXPERIENCE
text:
What an excellent stay!

New property a block away from Hudson Yards.
Great location, close to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden. Within walking distance to The Highline Park , The Edge and Vessel.

The rooms are large, very comfortable and tastefully decorated with natural wood decor and cozy sitting area. Panoramic windows with beautiful views.
Marble bathroom including a large walk-in shower.
One-Bedroom Suites with option to adjoin to a deluxe room, perfect for parents with kids.

1700 sq Fitness Center, well equipped. 
There's a wonderful fireplace with cozy sitting area in the lobby.

The entire staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. The front desk provides excellent advise for sightseeing .

The Pendry is a haven of peace in the hustle and bustle. Thank you for thist  WONDERFUL EXCELLENT stay!!

title: Classy and Sophisticated
text: This ultramodern luxury facility at the heart of Manhattan is conveniently located next to many of the tourist attractions. We loved the prompt service,  warmth and kindness from  the associates. Would definitely recommend this property to anyone hoping to have a lovely stay in New York!

title: Lovely Soothing Hotel - Customized stay, with attention to detail
text: The experience was extremely welcoming from the walking in the door to the access to amenities and restaurants. The room was perfectly clean and staff was responsive for requests. The hotel ambiance was relaxing and soothing with ease of stay. Highly recommend.

title: GREAT LOCATION, TRE ELEGANTE'
text: Great staff, elegant decor. Beautiful rooms, great responsive housekeeping. Love the small bar. 5 minute walk to Penn station is a big plus. Basically in the center of the universe. Easy travel anywhere in the city.

title: What a lovely, peaceful place.
text: The Pendry's expensive, but the experience is worth it.  Attentive staff, comfortable, sleek rooms and a great location near the High Line.  If you're looking for a cool, peaceful retreat after a day in the city, treat yourself to a stay at the Pendry.

title: Amazing Hotel
text: One of the best hotels my wife and I have stayed in NY.  Clean, Amazing Customer Service, Great Restaurants, and amazing location. I will be coming back with the entire family end of August.  Cant wait.

title: Your new Manhattan West Destination Hotel
text: From the moment I stepped o to the property I was greeted with a smile and anything they could do to help me.my room was beautiful. The bathroom is full size and the bedding was beautiful. My room had floor to ceiling windows that looked out to a great court yard. We went down to the outdoor bar before dinner and it did not disappoint!  I can not wait to come back to the Pendry.

title: Fabulous Stay
text: If you love Japanese-themed environments and hospitality, you will love this hotel.  The service was beyond reproach.   The rooms - both our own and the common areas - were stunning.  Restaurants inside the hotel offered spectacular food, again with outstanding service.  The first three photos below show the bar area that doubles as the breakfast area. The next three show the view from the outdoor bar.  Hotel is located in a new, hip neighborhood called Manhattan West (very close to Hudson Yards).  Couldn’t be happier with this hotel!

title: Best in NYC
text: Everything about our stay was perfect. The front office staff was unbelievably kind and accommodating to make sure we had everything we needed for our stay. 10/10 the Pendry is a must visit when staying in the city.

title: Number 1 for good reason
text:
Wonderful experience!  From making our reservations to pre arrival communication to our stay and after, the Pendry was amazing.  Anna Lisa and her team could not have been more accommodating.  In a time when many hotels are struggling w staffing, the Pendry seems to have all the right people in all the right places.
Stylish and clean, every detail has been thought of.  Wonderful location w transportation nearby making it easy to see and do everything we had planned.
Several options for food and drinks as well as 24 hour room service which our group took advantage of and did not disappoint.  In the city that never sleeps, we slept well each of our 4 night stay; comfy and quiet.
Many thanks to the team for a wonderful and memorable stay; it’s no wonder you are number 1 in all of Manhattan.  Well deserved!

title: Wonderful stay in West Manhattan
text: We had a great couples stay in this beautiful hotel with amazing and engaging warm staff.   Great hospitality and beautiful views.  Great bars for a nightcap. Highly recommend. Nice restaurants on property and great access to high line and Hudson yards.  Excellent staff.  Thank you for a great stay.

title: Beautiful property and great staff at the Pendry
text: Our family stayed at the Pendry while visiting NYC.  Convenient to Penn station and nearby many restaurants and shopping.  Our family especially enjoyed the staff at the hotel, where they made us feel at home and made our stay personable.  We will definitely be staying here again.

title: Awesome new hotel in Hudson Yards area!
text: The Pendry is by far one of the nicest hotels we’ve ever stayed at. We stayed over July 4th weekend and I can’t think of any other place where we felt so welcome and cared for than at the Pendry. The suite we stayed in had a lot of space including a full dining table which was great for room service and delivery orders. The decor is very modern with high end amenities. We definitely took it all in while wearing the complimentary robes! The hotel is also a short walk from Hudson Yards and the Highline which made it even more convenient for a family like ours with 2 grade school age kids. Also highly recommend eating at Zouzou in the hotel. Thanks to the staff here for making our stay so pleasurable and relaxing. Five stars all the way!!

title: Great Overall Experience
text: Great stay. The staff, service, cleanliness, in-room dining, restaurants and cocktail lounges all excellent. Next time I’m back in NYC I will be returning to The Pendry and will look for other Pendry’s in other cities.

title: Best staycation
text:
4th of July weekend…Celebrated with a staycation for both our daughters birthdays.
From beginning to end the attention to detail and the above and beyond hospitality was definitely noticed and appreciated by all of us. 
We were touched from the cake and stuffed animals to the tiny luxurious bathrobes.
So family friendly yet feeling super glamorous at the same time. This was by far the nicest hotel/room we’ve ever stayed in. 
Even our birthday meal at ZouZous was unforgettable with every bite being more delicious than the last. 
I can’t recommend the Pendry Manhattan West more with their superb staff extremely convenient location and just a wonderful memorable experience the whole weekend. We can’t wait to go back!! Thank you Pendry!

title: Excellent stay!
text: Staff's attention to delivering outstanding service couldn't be beat. Swift and friendly check-in experience, and can't say enough great things about the beautiful rooms. Luxe, comfortable, and every finish detail was thought through thoroughly. Bell staff was always there to open the door when coming and going, and always offered a friendly greeting with a smile. As a bonus, the location is perfect right near Hudson Yards which resulted in us opting to use the High Line to walk everywhere!

title: NYC WEEKEND LUXE EXPERIENCE
text: I was in town to see “Dear Evan Handsen” on Broadway.  I had an amazing experience at the hotel.  Juan the doorman, the front desk and housekeepers were all so attentive and kind to me, my husband and our dog.   The view on our room was spectacular and the location is bar none for me as I work in the Loreal building often. I highly recommend the Pendry and Ricky Grunden who helped us make this weekend very special! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Fantastic stay with great service!
text: This was my first time staying at Pendry Manhattan West and I loved every part of it. John checked us in was very helpful and made us feel very welcome. We then headed to bar Pendry and we were taken care of by Gina the bartender. Gina made us some delicious cocktails and we had a chance to get to know her a bit since we were the only ones at the bar at that time. She was very pleasant and kept us entertained while also giving us some great tips for where to go in the city. Also a big shout to Mccord and his in room dining team! They were very prompt and professional with every order and the food was delicious. Violet checked us out and held our bags for a couple hours while we toured the city a little more before we had to catch our train which was made everything effortless. Now while the building is beautiful, and I can't wait for the rooftop bar to open up so i can visit again, the thing that will actually keep me coming back is the friendly service from the whole staff!

title: Beautiful Respite to be Savored
text:
Research trip for business and also the opportunity enjoy the wonderful art exhibitions. 

The Pendry Manhattan West has created a quiet oasis with light-filled rooms, ease of location just a short walk from the new Moynihan Train Hall, and yummy food options s that beyond the typical fare.

title: Fabulous Stay in Hudson Yards
text:
Pendry Manhattan West will greet you style and treat you like family ! 
Fabulous location, staff and wonderful bar & eatery.  Late night drinks at Bar Pendry was wonderful. Pre-dinner get together with friends at Chez Zous outdoor space delightful.

title: Beautiful Property, Amazing Service!
text:
As a former NY, I am quite picky about where I spend my time and have to say that I was blown away by the location of this property. The restaurant and bars within the hotel are top notch, and anything else you need is right outside your door - amazing shopping, more great food, beautiful spaces to relax and walk.

The rooms are so smartly appointed, clean, and comfortable. They did not miss a beat in the design.

Most importantly, the team is AMAZING. I was recognized and welcomed back every time I returned. The Front Desk and Bell teams were so warm and welcoming. Our server at the Gold Bar was the perfect balance of attentive and engaging without being obtrusive.

I cannot recommend this hotel enough. It checks every box - great food and cocktails, great location, and most importantly great people!

title: Awesome
text:
Great location,  friendly staff , great restaurant and bars. I recommend  Pendry hotel's  super clean. Staff very helpful with directions to attractions.

Super recomendado este hotel,  muy limpio, gran comida y empleados ambled, cerca a las atrscciones turisticas.

title: Elegant and Warm
text: The staff is genuinely warm and interested in how your stay is going, and the hotel is beautifully appointed. It is elegant but extremely comfortable. Rooms are generously sized by New York standards and the multiple restaurants and bars are all of superb quality.

title: Spectacular Experience
text: My wife and I spent the weekend at Pendry Manhattan West and could not have been happier with our time there. The Restaurants were amazing, in room dining made us not want to leave our room, and the cocktails we had throughout our stay were perfect. From the front office team to the crew in in room dining, there was not an experience anything less than perfect. The room was super comfortable and the bed super plush. We cannot wait to go back!

title: The hotel service staff is very patient and attentive
text: It was a very good experience, the hotel's customer service staff was very welcoming and on call, the hotel room was also very nice, very bright and comfortable, if out of 100 points, I would probably give a high score of 97 or more.

title: Lovely hotel, perfect location!
text: We enjoyed our stay! 10/10 would recommend. The hotel is in the perfect location to easily access anything in Manhattan. We love sailing with Classic Harbor Line and Pendry Manhattan West is an easy walk to their location at Chelsea Piers. We were traveling with our 7mo old and the hotel went above and beyond to accommodate us. Don't miss the Vista Lounge - you won't be disappointed with the ambiance, food or drinks. We loved it!

title: The Pendry Is Home
text: I traveled to Manhattan to see Billy Joel at MSG. I booked a 5 night stay at the Pendry Manhattan West for myself and a friend. There was not one moment when I didn't feel like I was at home. As we dashed in and out, Sasha and the doorman/valet crew not only welcomed us as if they missed seeing our faces, but actually looked out for our safety. We were always offered water, assistance in acquiring transportation, an open door, and a friendly "Welcome Home"or "Enjoy your day"! The Hotel itself is hip and trendy but not pretentious. The Outdoor lounge on the fourth floor was beautiful for an early Summer Night. Our room was impeccable with a tremendous view from West 33rd. The Pendry Manhattan West (and other locations) will always be my home for future travels.

title: Amazing hotel and impeccable service
text: My family just stayed at the Pendry and I have to say, it was amazing. The hotel is beautiful everywhere, the rooms and bathrooms were fantastic, the location two blocks from Penn Station allowed us to train in from Newark and train out to Long Island. And as nice as all that is, the staff was even better. Everyone was so polite and helpful, opening doors, offering water when we came in, mailing a card for us when we forgot to bring a stamp, helping with restaurant and transportation recommendations. It was like a throwback to old times when people took pride in providing the best service possible. Simply superior.

title: Great new addition to NYC!
text: The Pendry Manhattan is a great hotel in Hudson yards. Customer service goes above and beyond most hotels we have visited. The bars and restaurants - all 5 stars! Rooms were very comfortable and overall we had an amazing weekend stay.

title: Incredible hotel and staff
text: The inroom dining was wonderful and the kind people on the phone we’re so helpful. - Choephel and Katar went above and beyond and very professional. We loved our stay at the Pendry. It is an Excellent  hotel and the views are incredible. The entire hotel and staff are an oasis in the big apple.  Thank you to the entire Pendry staff for being so marvelous.

title: Not worth the squeeze
text: I travel frequently for business and typically choose a hotel from the Amex program of Fine Hotels. When the Penury was available as an option I was excited to try it out. It was an adequate stay, but I will not go out of my way to stay at this property again.  Room service food was below average.  The lighting in the room is very moody, but not conducive to working or applying make-up. I was placed in room on the 11th floor, but there was a band playing in the courtyard below until well after midnight that made getting to bed/sleep at an early hour nearly impossible.

title: Don’t believe the hype
text:
Wanted to love the hotel, but it’s various cons outweighed it’s pros and it’s really just not a 5 star experience. 

Pros- Beautiful design and modern architecture in a serene setting in both common areas and rooms. Great common areas behind the hotel. Location is also great to access Hudson Yards. 4th floor bar terrace is beautiful and Zou- Zou is great. 

Cons- lobby smells like a bbq restaurant at all times from the Zou Zou wood burning oven. 4th floor is frequently unavailable because of “private” events - without notice. Bar Pendry staff was less than accommodating 15 minutes before their stated closing time on a Friday night. Hotel fronts the tunnel entrance so traffic gets snarled there at times and getting a ride share/cab or being dropped off can be really problemtic. 

Wanted to love the experience given the reviews and accolades, but came away very, very underwhelmed. Not a good value for the price and they could use a bit more hospitality training to focus on client service and a 5 star experience. Had several borderline rude encounters with various staff (Bar Pendry) and 4th floor restaurant workers (the patio servers were great) that shocked us as guests of the hotel. 

With other true 5 star options in the city and the glaring negatives, we will not be back.

title: Fabulous liftoff every morning from  Pendry Manhattan West- HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Everything from the Valets to the Front Desk Registration plus maid service to indoor eating and room service was F A B U L O U S.

text: Lovely experience, overall A+ service. The front desk staff members were pleasant and helpful. The doormen were attentive from carrying luggage to hailing a cab. The rooms were slightly smaller than the Pendry Baltimore location, but other than that - everything was exceptional.

title: 5 Star NYC Experience
text: The quality at the The Pendry was second to none!  I highly recommend the hotel for family and friends.    Everything from the warm & welcoming staff to the soft linens and robes made my family's trip to the city feel even more special. Thank you again!

title: A beautiful hotel in an amazing area
text: The Pendry Manhattan west is a beautiful and tastefully decorated hotel with great service.  It's located in Manhattan West, which is an entire city block developed with the hotel, restaurants and a Whole Foods Super Market.  There are high end restaurants, a food court and plenty of space to walk or sit.  Hudson Yards is right across the street and the High Line is quite near as well.  I highly recommend this hotel and the area!

title: Perfect boutique 5-star hotel for business or leisure stay
text: Great midtown location especially if your company’s office is right next door.  Soundproof rooms, great bed, premium bed linens, doorman always there to open the door for you.  Great open space right next to it with Wholefoods and restaurants, even a racquet court and stage for performances.

title: Pendry NY
text: First time staying at  Pendry MW. It is truly world class   The staff was freiendly, accomodating and go above and beyond. Attention to detail was incredible. Everywhere you looked whether in your room or common areas it was immaculate.

title: A Personal Touch, Even In Manhattan
text: Greenwich village resident here, looking for a staycation on our wedding weekend. As far as boutique hotels go, the Pendry should be the international standard. Unreal service, where the personalties of the staff shine through in every interaction—you will have your New York moment every time. We are beyond grateful, humbled by the design and style, and walked out feeling this place just redefined luxury for all of us.

title: A great hotel in a great location
text: Hard to improve on the previous reviews but here goes. From the minute you arrive you are greeted by warm and friendly staff. Everyone tries to do their best to ensure that you are made feel welcome. Check in is quick and seamless. Your luggage is taken to your room and the staff member explains everything. Special mention for the mini-bar. It’s a mini-bar. It’s expensive and if you take out an item for more than 30 seconds you are charged for it. If you think it’s excessive or unusual, read up on hotel mini-bars. Lighting is complicated. Might be worth a quick run through by staff when you get to your room. The showers are not the best. They are very hard to turn on and unless you use force when you turn it off, it will drip continuously. A lot of these points are guest experience for the hotel to improve on. The room and view were great. Overall experience was excellent. Did I mention the wonderful door staff? Can’t wait to go back again.

title: Best new hotel in Manhattan
text: My wife and I stayed one night to attend the ballet. The Pendry exceed our expectations, even at that price point. The front of house staff is as good as it gets, especially Sasha, the door man. Great food and drinks, and the room was spectacular. Highly recommend this new, desperately needed midtown gem.

title: Top Notch
text: I stayed at Pendry Manhattan West for an overnight stay in NYC and the whole experience was impeccable from start to end. Attention to detail is noticeable in every aspect of this hotel. The staff is warm and accommodating, the rooms are spacious and extremely clean, the design is stunning and the central location is perfect. The food at Zou Zous was delicious and refreshingly unique. I will be back and highly recommend the Pendry for your NYC stay.

title: The Beds Ruined Our Trip
text:
We went here with a large group of family members. The problem with this property is form over function. The staff were all so wonderful and so helpful and really went above and beyond. It's the room itself that's the problem.

First of all please be very cautious because what looks like a refrigerator isn't really a refrigerator. Most of us know about the mini bar in hotels. This is different. If you take anything off of the shelf in the fridge and keep it out for over 60 Seconds you get charged for it. I think cokes were $9 Plus a 20% restocking fee. Waters with Pendry branding were either $12  or $14 plus the 20% fee. Repackaged drugstore candy like MnM's and sour gummies in plain little tins that hold maybe a handful of candy cost $18 between the cost of the item and the restocking fee.

Do not put anything in this refrigerator. If you do you can throw off the sensors and end up charged. You have to contact housekeeping if you want a fridge in your room. 

I still have no idea how to get ice there, absent calling downstairs for it. I think they'd bring you a baby elephant if you asked. Maybe the Lost Ark, even. The service is 
 great. 

There is just no comfortable place in the room unless you like extremely soft beds. They are ok to sit on for a bit. That's it for me at least. I like/need reasonably firm beds. I woke up every day in increasingly intense pain and with an ever-increasing sleep deficit that made me so fatigued I didn't have the energy to do anything while I was in New York. In fact I woke up so often during the night I'm not sure I ever got any deep sleep. The last night at about 5 in the morning with tears running down my face involuntarily, I pulled the velcroed-on cushion from a little bench in the room and tried to lay on the floor, but that wouldn't work either as it was too small. I think they have soldered the comforter to the mattress somehow so I couldn't lay on that on the floor either. 

There is a little bench that's kind of built into the wall and looks like something you find in one of those tiny homes. There was only 1 chair, in front of the floor-to-ceiling windows that make up the whole outer wall. It is small, orange, and turns in a full circle. Neither the bench nor the chair are comfortable for sitting. 

This was the most uncomfortable I have ever been in my entire life. It was worse than middle school. It kind of ruined my trip.

That being said, if you like extremely soft beds you may be okay.

title: Well appointed with luxury amenities and service.
text:
Beautifully appointed with luxury amenities and service.  Proximity to Hudson Yard with lots of dining/shopping options.  

Service was top notch.  Hotel Manager Daniel was gracious and personally recognized us.  I forgot an item in the room and when I called a few hours later they had  retrieved it and stored it safely until my return visit in 2 weeks.

Highly recommended for your visit to NYC.

title: Excellent
text: Great stay! The service and attention to detail was outstanding. Enjoyed the personal service from before I arrived until leaving for the airport. Really appreciated that once you step in the hotel, the hustle and bustle of the city falls away. I was surprised at how quiet it was in the hotel and in the rooms.

title: Awesome getaway
text: Great location and the most amazing staff around.  They made my trip not only successful but worth it.  The view from my room of the Empire State Bulging was priceless and very sentimental since it was the first time I was back in the city since my partner passed away a year ago today. We love Zou Zou's and highly recommend. The staff, location and guest rooms are fantastic. We are going back for a wedding in June and can't wait to visit this hotel again. Best hotel in NYC.

title: Perfect!
text:
Loved our stay at the Pendry!  Every employee was welcoming and very accommodating but we'd like to recognize Misael and Sasha and thank them for their exceptional service, they really made our stay special with their friendly greetings and always made sure we were well taken care of. text: One of the most beautiful & impeccably clean hotels we’ve ever stayed in! The hospitality is second to none and the staff was incredibly attentive to every detail. The bar has an excellent vibe and the cocktails were perfection. We will absolutely be back!

title: Always the best experience

title: Fantastic service!
text: We had a fantastic staycation at the Pendry last week, including wonderful in-room dining service from Choephel. He brought us the best breakfast. Thanks Pendry Manhattan West team (especially McCord Henry!!) for a relaxing, fun stay.

title: Incredible Stay
