The food was inspired and delicious. What's wonderful is how the hotel feels both cosmopolitan and urban while being intimate and luxuriously domestic. Not an easy thing to pull off. We'll be back!

title: Amazing
text: The staff was super welcoming, the room was amazing, the bed was so comfortable, I usually have trouble falling asleep but not in that bed, I fell asleep almost instantly.  Housekeeping was great, kept the room tidy all the time.

title: Beautiful hotel but the highlight was the staff
text: My wife and I had a wonderful experience at this new hotel.  First, the building itself is very finely constructed and decorated - sophisticated but not overdone.  The room was very comfortable and spacious with a nice seating area looking out over the plaza below.  The beds were super comfortable, the bath fixtures deluxe.  The Bar Pendry is very cozy with a cool vibe - a more modern version of a Palm Springs speak easy.  The food at Zou Zou was outstanding and pleasantly different.  But the highlight of the stay was the staff - everyone we interacted with was exceptionally helpful and made us feel right at home.  Several went out of their way to help us with a challenge we had.  This is clearly a well run hotel.  We will be back.

title: The hotel gem in Manhattan
text:
We had an amazing experience at Pendry Manhattan West. It was truly an experience from being greeted warmly throughout our stay, consistent help from the staff and receiving their suggestions regarding the best places for shopping, eating and enjoying the attractions. IRD’s menu was filled with many options (including late night). Choephel was great as we chatted about our families and received his suggestions on NYC attractions.

We look forward to returning.

title: Best new hotel in Manhattan
text: Absolutely loved the hotel.  Great location.  5 min walk to Penn station and can’t wait to to stay there again.  Love boutique hotels.  Rooms are a perfect size and has two sinks!  Bed and bedding were so comfortable and toiletries were so good that we are going to purchase.

title: Very satisfied
text:
When we booked our suite, we had high expectations from all the reviews we had read.  The Pendry did not disappoint! 

The suite was spotlessly clean.  One member of our group had allergies and we were concerned about Pendry allowing pets.  They assured us, that the cleaning is extremely thorough and that they would take extra care for us and that, they did.  Our guest with allergies had absolutely no issues.

Everyone we met in the lobby, at the front desk, room service was very hospitable.

title: Wonderful Family Stay
text: The staff at The Pendry made my family vacation special. They are knew all of our names and were always a step ahead of us. They made our boys feel like the most important people at the hotel.  I can’t wait to visit all the Pendry hotels!

title: A perfect place for a perfect location!
text: This is a very special place, where you feel at home. Outstanding service in the hotel (Front desk, doormen, concierge). Centrally located, a few minutes away from the Highline, Hudson Yards and Madison Square Garden.

title: Subtle Luxury, Pampered Experience.
text: The interior design drew us to the Pendry, but it was the service that truly made the stay. From the moment we walked through the door, we felt welcomed by the Pendry Manhattan West's warm wood accents, beautiful textures, and subtle luxury. That feeling of welcome continued with Violet at the front desk and their entire team. We enjoyed a room overlooking the plaza and were quite impressed with the fit and finish throughout. Breakfast at the Vista Lounge exceeded our expectations, and Vista Lounge now holds the title for my favorite pancakes thus far! Don't sleep on those. We also loved the intimate vibes in Bar Pendry both evenings. They've made fans of us, and we'll be back for sure.

title: Highly Recommend
text: I highly recommend this hotel. I had an excellent stay. I felt very welcomed. Housekeeping was excellent. Front desk was amazing, made great recommendations on where to visit. Views from the room were amazing. I have stayed at a lot of hotels and was extremely impressed. Location was quite convenient. Pretty walkable to everywhere but not too busy like times square hotels. Also Penn station was close by which was really convenient.

title: Perfect getaway in New York
text:
Pendry Manhattan West is a brand new hotel ideally located, one block away from Penn Stqtion and from Hudson Yards.
First thing you notice is the impressive wavy glass  facade. And once inside you can’t help but appreciate the beautiful materials used everywhere with a balanced mix of wood and stone.
The hotel has brought a Californian vibe to Manhattan and it works perfectly.
It feels like the rushing vibe of Manhattan completely stops once inside to convey a peaceful atmosphere.
I loved the standalone bath 
Had a drink at the Pendry Bar, look for it, it’s hidden behind a door on your way to Zou Zou’s the hotel restaurant !
Staff is super friendly 
And if you come later this spring you will be lucky to experience the rooftop bar and it’s amazing view
Would strongly recommend!

title: Recent Stay at Pendry Manhattan West
text: Such an escape from your typical NYC hotel experience. The design, the lighting, the service level, accommodations and F&B outlets all come together to create an impeccable place to stay. 10/10 recommend!

title: Very Clean Hotel with Beautiful Decor and Friendly Staff
text: The woodwork in the rooms and hallways of the hotel is exceptional! I had to mention this because the attention to details at the Pendry Manhattan West was shown from their customer service to the building's craftsmanship.

title: Girl's Weekend
text: My friends and I had a getaway weekend in the city and chose Pendry for its location and great reviews. This hotel is STUNNING! The rooms are such a great size for NYC, and the in-room dining experiences we had were top-notch. The staff is so welcoming and the lobby has such a great cozy vibe to come back to. We also enjoyed the restaurant in the lobby as well as the bar. It's also across the street from Penn Station - very easy to hop on the train from Philly/Baltimore/DC. Hope to come back in the summer!

title: Incredible Stay
text: One of the most amazing hotel stays I've ever experienced. Every detail of the room and the staff was designed to optimize our stay and make it a memorable experience. Food was excellent at the restaurant and for in-room dining. Highly recommend the speak-easy style bar for a late night drink.

title: Weekend Visit
text: When we visited this hotel last November 2021; it was very newly opened. We were greeted with a very friendly staff. Only the Garden Lounge was open where they served wonderful breakfast along with friendly staff. Definitely worth a second visit.

title: Really lovely new hotel in Manhattan
text: I stayed recently and this location cannot be beat - right next to the vessel, the Shed and the entrance to the highline. The staff across the board were warm, welcoming, accommodating. Really top notch service. We loved our room, the alcove where we snuggled up and had some great conversations and that plenty of water was provided during our stay. Zou Zou's was delicious and a beautiful spot for a meal. We loved the decor and everything about our stay!!

title: Stunning New Property
text:
What joy to have an exceptional hotel near or practically right next to Madison Square Garden. For years the area has been sorely lacking in both hotel properties and restaurants, and this newcomer ads a double win.
It seems every detail has been paid attention to, the custom wood surfaces, the linens, fabrics, carpets, furniture, and the exterior of the building is stunning - almost hidden on the street, and then you walk into an OASIS like feeling in the lobby. Zou Zou's on the first floor is a delicious eastern Mediterranean restaurant and is as wonderful to look at as it is to eat at.

title: Simply the best!
text: My wife and I came in the city to celebrate her birthday.  At arrival we were welcomed by a bottle of champagne and cupcakes from Magnolia with welcome note. The interior is very modern and high-quality. Room is very clean and quiet, and has the most comfortable bed I ever slept in. It was great to soak in the bathtub while peeping out manhattan traffic. Bar on the ground has exceptional vibe and offers great cocktail list.  The staffs are fantastic and service is excellent from the moment we arrived. We cannot wait to come back for another special night. Thank you Pendry team for such an incredible accommodation.

title: NYE
text:
I stayed at the Pendry West Manhattan in February, my time was pleasant. The location is great, the team is amazing and service present.
IRD food was very delicious, well presented and was serve very fast. 
Annalisa at the front desk was extremely helpful in making sure I had everything during my stay. 
I will be back for sure.

title: Excellent Stay
text: Our stay with Pendry Manhattan this weekend was top notch from start to finish. The accommodations were immaculate and welcoming, and the overall decor of the hotel is stunning. We took full advantage of the in room dining options, and can’t speak highly enough of our server Choephel. The staff was warm and knowledgeable and we look forward to visiting again!

title: CEO, Organic Spa Magazine
text: Excellent experience all around. Great service, cheerful and friendly staff, the rooms are meticulous with a sublime esthetic and decor, and excellent onsite fitness and restaurant options. The Pendry exudes the new modernist approach to hospitality.

title: Shines Bright Like a Diamond
text:
My husband and I came in town for a very brief one night stay to see a show at Carnegie Hall.  I suffer with OCD and after a prior NYC visit where we stayed at another hotel I had to ensure we stayed at an extremely clean and quiet hotel.  

Since it was just one night we opted for the “regular” king room.  It was far from regular.  The size of the room was perfect.  The layout was perfect.  Anything that you could possibly want/need was available in the room or hotel.  We were welcomed with open arms as soon as we exited the car with staff members that work extremely hard, simple valet parking, smooth check-in, a hand written note, fresh fruit, sparkling water, bottled water, beautiful surroundings, amazing turn down service and more!  Early check-in & higher room preference was noted but due to traffic we arrived around 4pm and the 18th floor room was ready.

Due to expected snow we planned to checkout early the next morning, however our minds were telling us to get up and our bodies were saying let’s enjoy just a little longer.  I had the best sleep ever in a hotel and I am so very grateful.  

Hudson Yards is an easy block away.  Theater District was approximately 20 blocks away, but Uber worked well for our needs.  We hope to have an excuse to return sooner rather than later for a longer stay, when it is warmer and we can walk around the area until our hearts are content.  The area has a lot to offer.  First visit at any Pendry hotel but it won’t be our last.  Thank you Pendry staff, particularly the evening team (I don’t want to forget anyone’s name).

title: Memorable Stay
text: Everyone from the valet to the front desk to the wait staff made our stay truly pleasant and enjoyable. My wife and I felt as if we were the only guests staying in the hotel from the care and professionalism by everyone at Pendry. We cannot wait to take another weekend getaway and unquestionably we will be staying here again. Thank you to the entire team there at Pendry!

title: Best in NYC
text:
I stayed at the Pendry West Manhattan twice during the months of January and February and each time was absolutely thrilled with my experience. 

The location is great and the rooms were clean and spacious but what separates the Pendry from other hotels is the amazing staff and service they present to you. 

Juan, who greeted us when we arrived, graciously brought us drinks while we checked in and brought our bags up to our room. 

McCord, Rotimi, and Katar provided us excellent food and beverage service (which was delicious). 

Annalisa and Deki at the front desk were extremely helpful in making sure we had everything we needed to enjoy our stay!

Joli Specia in HR is also a rockstar, along with the rest of the staff who’s names we didn’t get. 

All in all it was a great experience and we will be returning soon!

title: Dedicated to a Great Guest Experience
text:
This was my first stay at the Pendry.  The first impression I had was with the doorman who was unbelievable welcoming and personable.  Then the front desk folks continued on with the same tone.  During my stay, I interacted with bar staff, restaurant staff, and even a maintenance tech.  Every interaction was the same.  These people are very service-oriented and go out of their way to make sure you are having a great stay.

On top of this, the hotel is gorgeous.  Extremely clean and modern.  Everything felt like it was new.  They have a super modern and clean fitness room as well.  The food at the restaurants was almost as good as the service.

Overall GREAT experience and will definitely go back.

title: Glowing Perfection
text:
A truly breathtaking bar with impeccable service. Thank you for such a lovely escape.❤️

The drinks were delicious, the fire a comfort, the water glasses refilled frequently.  Cannot wait to return to stay at the Penney soon. What a jewel box in midtown.

title: Definitely going back!
text: It was a memorable experience from the moment I stepped in the hotel to when I checked out. Everyone I met was amazing! Shout out to Juan at the front desk. He was thoughtful, friendly and exceptional. I will never forget how he made me feel. The hotel is new and in a great location. What made it really exceptional for me was the warmth of the staff

title: My new favorite NYC hotel!
text: 10/10 would recommend the Pendry Hotel! The hotel was beautiful and the staff were very friendly and attentive. It’s in close walking distance to several restaurants and is just a short walk away from MSG/ Penn Station. We can’t wait to stay here again.

title: Can’t wait to be back
text:
Californian Approved!
I just checked out of the Pendry Manhattan West after a wonderful one night stay with my sister to celebrate her birthday! I was warmly greeted by Violet and Juan after a rough commute to the hotel in the snow storm. It was an instant defrost both mentally and physically from being in such a beautiful lobby. The fireplace, calming color scheme, and friendly people all just makes you feel at peace. We were upgraded to a beautiful corner room on a high floor facing south. Beautifully designed rooms with the most comfortable sheets, plush towels, and robes we were determined to never take off. A very friendly Bronson came to the room shortly after I arrived to deliver a celebratory amenity on behalf of the entire hotel to wish my sister a Happy birthday. As we were rushing to make our dinner off property, the house car conveniently was available to drive us which was such a great surprise because we were dreading the walk through the snow. To top off our experience we enjoyed a beautiful breakfast in room which was delivered by Katar who clearly loves what he does. The food was excellent! Their Brioche French Toast is sooooo good. While checking out of the hotel, we also saw a celebrity so that was pretty cool. From a Californian living in the hustle and bustle of New York City, this staycation really reminded me of the calmness of home while still delivering top notch service from the staff. It’s a very laid back aesthetic yet intricate details. Hard to explain, you will have to visit to understand. I highly recommend!!

title: Peaceful oasis in Manhattan
text: Stayed here twice in the past month, and both experiences were outstanding.  The feeling of warmth and hospitality from the staff is really amazing.  Tensin, Victoria, John, …. all were great.  The rooms and common spaces have been crafted with incredible attention to design and detail — perfect without trying too hard.

title: Crown Jewel of NYC
text:
Stayed at The Pendry for a business trip, and was very impressed with the room, the service, and the location. Everything was top notch - and Zous Zous is the perfect restaurant to host a meeting.

Would highly recommend!

title: Beautiful Hotel with Superb Service
text: My husband and I stayed at the Pendry recently for a night in the city and we could not be happier with our experience.  The hotel is contemporary and luxurious, while still feeling warm and cozy.   The architecture and design is really beautiful; I loved all the amazing wood work.  The service was top notch.  We ordered breakfast to our room and it was delivered with a bright smile by a very genial server named Bronson. The breakfast sandwich was delicious and the bagel spread was classic NYC.  The presentation was lovely and it was even accompanied with a little handwritten quote!  Such a nice touch.  Unfortunately, we weren't able to make it to the restaurant this time, but the space was very cool.  If the room service is any indication, then I am sure the food is amazing.  We are definitely going to return to the Pendry next time we are in town.

title: Relaxing Night at the Pendry
text: I stayed at the Pendry last weekend for a girls night and had the most amazing time. You feel the luxury and attentiveness the minute you walk in. What I loved the most was the view of the ice skating rink and city from the 12th floor. I also enjoyed the bar and the restaurant. I am already planning my next stay!

title: Super fun Girls Night Out!
text: My girlfriends and I had a staycation and had an amazing experience. Although it was only for one night, we were blown away by the service, the decor, and overall aesthetic. We had drinks at the bar and had dinner at Zou Zou! Everything there was delicious and I would definitely return for a romantic evening with my husband.  The room was gorgeous, unbelievable view and super clean. The big screen TV and mini bar were definite plusses!

title: A wonderfully memorable stay
text:
My fiancée and I were celebrating my birthday with a night in the city. Although it was only one night, we were incredibly impressed by the accommodations, food, and the overall customer experience. The staff was incredibly courteous and welcoming. A house car was provided, free of charge, so we could avoid taxis/Uber. The overall esthetic was incredibly warm, swanky, and sharp. 

I would like to make special mention of one particularly lovely moment. We had room service delivered by a gentleman named Rotimi. Rotimi and I had a brief but pleasant exchange where I shared it was my birthday, we were going to see a show, and that my fiancée is pregnant. He was incredibly warm and kind and shared some words of celebration and congratulations. 

Later that evening, when we returned from the show, we found that Rotimi had arranged a little gift be sent to our room. If that wasn’t special enough, he had left a handwritten note with well wishes for us in this exciting chapter of our lives. 

I wish there was more that I could do to show my genuine appreciation and gratitude to Ro. It was a simple gesture that had an amazing impact and was the cherry on top of a lovely stay with Pendry.

title: Hands down best customer service
text: This was my first time at the Pendry and I cannot wait to return. From the moment I arrived at the hotel to the moment I left to return home, the service was amazing. Misael and Thinley at the door were super pleasant and helpful as was the front desk staff, housekeeping, in room dining staff and the housekeeping staff. It was an amazing experience.

title: Can't wait to return
text: My fiancé and I had a wonderful staycation at the Pendry Manhattan West. First, the hotel is absolutely stunning from the unique exterior, warm lobby, and perfectly appointed room. Aside from the gorgeous design, the service is what blew us away. We had incredible service starting with check in with Misael, Violet assisting us at the front desk, Nicolai delivering our delicious room service (breakfast in bed was particularly amazing) and Ngwang in housekeeping, we were treated like royalty throughout our stay. We ate dinner at ZouZou which was so convenient, fun, and fantastic (we will be returning with friends soon). We cant recommend Pendry enough and hope to stay here again soon!

title: Top Hotel
text:
Ich habe 3 Nächte in dem Pendry West Manhatten gewohnt. Top Hôtel, top rooms and best service!!!
Die Lage ist sehr gut und der Service hervorragend. Besonders ist zu erwähnen, das Bett ist so angenehm und komfortabel. Alle Zimmer super ausgestattet und sehr sauber. Alles ist brandneu. Danke an das Team !

title: Oasis in NYC
text: This hotel is tucked away in such a peaceful little nook of NYC that you'd never know you're steps away from all the best attractions and experiences. The rooms are clean and sleek with a spa-like ambiance of wood tones, and the staff is absolutely wonderful, actually making conversation and learning about you to make your stay even better. Great hotel in a great area, and I would choose it again and again when seeking accommodations in the city!

title: Wonderful Place to Stay
text: Can’t say enough about this hotel and how fabulous it was along with all of their staff! Sasha the driver was so special and the tall doorman couldn’t have been nicer and professional. We loved it and will be back!

title: Amazing stay from start to finish
text:
My boyfriend and I celebrated his birthday on Christmas Day at the Pendry and I’m so glad we did! What an amazing establishment. Service was 100% from beginning to end. Violet at the front desk was an absolute delight to talk to and she made sure we were well taken care of and answered all of our questions. The hotel is brand new so you can still smell the fresh new scent. The rooms are so amazingly clean and much bigger than other hotels rooms in NYC being that I’ve stayed in different hotels in New York! Upon arrival they sent us a bottle of champagne to celebrate Christmas/birthday with the most amazing note written by hand by McCord! He is so sweet and attentive. The common area with all the plants sets such a relaxing vibe to the hotel wether you’re just chilling, reading or enjoying a cup of coffee. We did order room service and the entire experience was absolutely amazing, please try the burger or the pancakes or both!! The bar is a whole different vibe, what I loved about it was the intimacy of it. I really really enjoyed chatting with Chris at the bar and he made me a delicious drink which I cannot remember the name lol 
At some point we got back to the room to drop something off and we crossed paths with the housekeeping and they asked us if we needed more ice for our champagne that we haven’t yet opened and I told them in two hours would be great, and in exactly two hours we had a knock at our door by someone bringing us ice… it’s the precision and attention to details for me. 
Lastly I wanted to thank all the door men for being so helpful and attentive, and thanks to especially IsMael( can’t remember if that was really his name) very sweet guy and very personable…  We can’t wait to go back ♥️
Thank you to the whole Pendry team

title: Incredible Experience
text: The staff was so accommodating and friendly. The hotel is absolutely stunning and we loved the bar and restaurant. Delicious food and cocktails. Cute coffee shop next to the lobby as well. Location was super convenient to everything. Will definitely be staying here again!

title: Amazing in every aspect!
text: Just loved my stay at Pendry Manhattan West. Staff is amazing, extremely kind, gentle and very very helpful. Everything was great. Everyone wants to make sure you are well taken care of. The property was great too. If you are looking to relax and be well treated (rare in NYC), this is the place!

title: Amazing hotel in Manhattan West
text: Loved everything about this hotel. Especially the design and the central location. Staff is very friendly and helpful with everything. I recommend having breakfast at Vista Lounge. The breakfast sandwich is delicious. The gym is very spacious and I enjoyed working out there every morning.

title: Amazing Stay
text: Such a wonderful hotel. From booking, through to check in, right up until we checked out. The team at the hotel make you feel very welcome and comfortable. The rooms are awesome, and in room dining was great! The hotel location is great for tourists too.

title: A time to remember!
text: The staff is welcoming ,friendly, accommodating, as we felt welcomed  from the time we were helped from our car. The service is second to none and The accommodations are spectacular. When we stay in New York we will stay at the Pendry west side.

title: Simply superb!
text: Where to start? The feel of this hotel is luxurious and warm. The staff is both professional and friendly, and throughout our stay our family felt welcome and looked after. Rooms are generous in size and extremely comfortable, and the interiors overall are simply gorgeous - the entire place feels like a serene oasis in the city. We ate at Zou Zous and were not disappointed. The food is amazing, and we especially loved the varied and flavorful small plates. Also, don't leave without trying a cocktail from the bar, a true NY experience! Thank you Pendry for an incredible stay!!

title: Perfect holiday season family trip
text: From the moment we arrived until the moment we left our whole experience was first class. We were a family of 9 and nothing was too much trouble and everything was done with a smile. Thank you for making our trip so special. Nice area to explore with the high line on the doorstep and close to good shopping and nice places to eat. The rooms are beautiful with great views.

title: Fantastic design and warm hospitality. Classic Pendry/Montage
text: Traveled to New York from Los Angeles to meet my parents for a holiday get together. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with poise and warmth from Sean and Deki at the front desk. After that, Juan the Bellman escorted us to our rooms promptly - he's a total gem! Enjoyed beautiful rooms with city views and fantastic amenities. I highly recommend a martini or Manhattan enjoyed in Bar Pendry; the copper ceilings are beautiful and space feels very NY. It was too short of a trip and I will be back soon. When it was time to leave they kindly offered to arrange travel to Newark for me. Simply the best.

title: Best of the best !!!!
text:
Best location, attentive service, first class amenities and a truly memorable stay. 
My kids loved all the amenities, room was comfortable and the personnel were amazing. The location is very convenient..

title: Amazing, Best Hotel Yet
text: This place is a must , 10/10 recommended. I would like to start off with Violet who definitely made my first 15 seconds memorable & very welcomed, right by her side was Juan who was very attentive and caring. But it doesn’t end there from In room dinning being 24 hours , wonderful customer service even at 1AM, they still made sure everything was great. I would like to give a special shout out to the Food & Beverage manager Mccord who was very welcoming and down to earth while making sure we were well taken care of! Down to Chris at the Bar ! very cool and funny guy, great conversation! The ending touch with Tsewang who made sure every door was open when we walked in and out, helped us with our bags and made us laugh while doing so! Let me not forget the house car driver I was unable to get his name, but he was great. Thank you Pendry Manhattan West for making my Anniversary trip amazing ! We can’t wait to be back !

title: Hands down the best.
text:
A perfect week end. 
Beds are comfortable. Sheets are great. Welcomed and brought to our room. Check in and checkout seem less. Room set up was clean and roomy. Beautiful and perfect extras to make ur stay amazing. The location was easy to walk down to the important must sees for Christmas. Excellent hotel!

title: A perfect location...close to everything but the mayhem of NYC
text: We could not have found a better location with great hospitality and professionalism! We were away from the mayhem and crowds of midtown Manhattan during the holidays.  But so easy to walk everywhere (Rockefeller Center, Theatre District, Highline).  Best shopping mall (the Hudson Yards Shops) 1 block away... where a visit to the EDGE is a must (one of our favorite experiences).  Very classy experience; experienced staff.  Safe protocols in place.  Amazing 24/7 gym with Peloton bikes and all the equipment anyone would need.  The views from the standard rooms not the best, but that is NYC with so much construction going on.

title: Winter trip
text: Beautiful room and such a comfortable feel. Such a warming welcome from walking through the doors and walking out. I would 100% recommend this place to everyone I know. This will be where I stay from now on every time I’m in New York.

title: Awesome Midtown Getaway Option
text: Just tried out the new Pendry in Midtown. Birthday celebration with Broadway show and dinner. The hotel is very conveniently located - 5 min walk from Penn Station and away from the noise and congestion of Broadway/Time Square. Beautiful rooms that feel oversized. Amazing and attentive staff. Great lobby bar that is small and intimate. Highly recommend for a NYC getaway any time as it’s a short walk shows, Madison Square Garden, and great restaurants (although the food at the hotel is fantastic). We had a great view down to the Statue of Liberty. Highly recommend!

title: My Favorite New NYC Hotel
text: Exceptional service, food and facilities.  Absolutely loved the room, drinks at the lobby bar and dinner at Zou Zou's.  Hotel is centrally located and everything you need is close by.  Also loved the coffee shop off the lobby.

title: Most Hospitable and Engaging team
text: This new hotel was an absolute WOW.  From the sleek, modern and comfortable rooms to amazing food, it was such a great visit to New York.  The team is so friendly and really knowledgeable about all the hotel details, the room service server shared all the features of the new restaurants and bars, and the employees at the front door helped with directions.  Other highlights of my stay included all our meals, the grilled branzino was amazing, chicken Caesar salad one of the best I've ever had and fresh pastries each morning, the super comfortable beds and location.  I can't wait to go back- Way to go Pendry Team!

title: The best new hotel in the city!
text: The new Pendry hotel located in the trending Hudson yard area is an absolute gem. The location, rooms and amazing staff are simply the best. The team is welcoming, warm and want to make sure you have a flawless stay. The room I stayed in was on of the best I have ever experienced: modern design, spacious, comfortable, functional and luxurious.  The front office manager Anastasia was extremely welcoming and very professional pre arrival and through my entire stay.The wonderful bellmen are Juan, David, Misael, Thinkey, Tsewang were so helpful & genuine l! The food was outstanding and I truly enjoyed the breakfast thanks to the outstanding service provided by the fabulous sever Jessica and the manager Joseph. The proximity to the mall (a 5 minutes walk) made it very easy to grab last minutes gifts and anything needed. I can’t wait to come back to visit again and I can’t recommend this stunning property enough for anything visiting the city for business or simply for leisure.

title: Bar Pendry
text: I was in the garden room served by a waitress named Evelyn. The manner in which she serves is superior and she clearly comes from executive level service. I will recommend her to all of my colleagues in the area. Thank you Evelyn.

title: Amazing Stay at Pendry
text: I cannot say enough great things about this hotel. Our stay was incredible. The hotel is conveniently located within a 5 minute walk from Moynihan Station in the brand new Manhattan West development. The hotel is stunning from the moment you enter, but what really made this hotel shine was the staff. Everyone was so kind and eager to assist. The Front Office Manager, Anastassiya, in particular was incredible and always greeted us by name with a smile. I highly recommend this hotel and it is a great addition to the NYC luxury hotel scene.

title: Amazing Luxury Hotel in NYC
text: We stayed at the Pendry Manhattan West during the busy post Thanksgiving weekend and couldn't be happier with the service, location and amenities.  The adjoining rooms on the 16th floor were perfect for our family of 5, and right in the heart of all the action in Hudson Yards.  From the warm welcome to fabulous dinner recommendation/reservation last minute late Saturday night, we were welcomed with open arms.  The rooms were very comfortable, with incredible views !  The highlight for us was the staff.  Jorge at the door, Anastaysia and her team at the front desk and then entire crew were exceptional. What an oasis of calm tranquility in the middle of all the action.  Steps from the Edge, the Vessel and Skating Rink, plus shopping galore.  Highly recommend this spot in Hudson Yards, we will be back!

title: Loved this Property in Manhattan
text: Loved being able to stay at Pendry Manhattan West. It was so refreshing to be in the city in an area that isn't so busy, but has so much surrounding it and it's pretty easy to get around. We stayed at one of the suites and it was so beautifully designed with everything so intentional and well done. We loved that it was also so pet friendly. the staff immediately felt like family, and we loved breakfast at the Vista Lounge. The property also has a car that guests can take if available and there's a really cute coffee shop by the lobby as well.

title: Our New Favorite NYC Luxury Hotel
text: We stayed at the Pendry during the busy post-Thanksgiving holiday shopping time. The hotel is well-located in the Hudson Yards area which has a lovely high-end shopping mall, outdoor skating rink, Whole Foods, food court, coffee shops, restaurants etc. The hotel's decor is new, fresh, and soothing. The comfy beds and quiet location provided us with a great night's sleep. No horns honking or sirens! We found the hotel staff to be super friendly, welcoming, and accommodating. And breakfast in the lounge was delicious! My only suggestion for the hotel would be to add detailed room layout info to its website to help with room selection. We have found our new favorite NYC luxury hotel!

title: Magical 48 Hours in Manhanttan
text:
From the moment we were greeted by the Doorman at the new Pendry Manhattan West, we knew we were going to have an amazing weekend in New York City.  The front desk was very kind, explaining the layout of this new hotel, think it only opened a few months ago.  Our room was very spacious and had all the amenities that you would come to expect from a luxury hotel.
The main restaurant was closed, but we had In Room Dining once and utilized the lounge on the second floor.  The server in room service was fantastic, going through our order, wishing us a wonderful visit and personal the entire time.  Food was excellent.
We were able to access all of Manhattan from this central location, dining in lower NYC for lunch one afternoon before going to Broadway that evening.  
Look forward to our next trip to NYC and Pendry Manhattan West, hopefully next time for more than 48 hours!

title: Amazing
text: From the email I received before my visit to walking out the door, Pendry knows customer service!  Check-in seamless, room perfect, beautiful, comfortable, food so so good! Don’t leave without stopping at Zou Zou for a specialty drink and some great food.  In a great location so much to do outside, but I didn’t want to leave the hotel.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: My overall experience was excellent.  The room was perfect. The staff exceptional.  Give Bar Pendry a try and don't forget Zou Zou.  Also, take advantage of the house car...super convenient.  I am definitely coming back!

title: Fantastic new hotel
text: The Pendry is a fantastic new hotel with beautifully designed rooms, courteous staff, and great central location to get to anywhere you want in NYC. I would highly recommend this hotel for your next stay in the city.

title: Service was excellent
text: The way a hotel distinguishes itself from the pack is with service in my opinion.  The hotel itself was beautiful, clean, well located but what makes me want to go back and stay there are the people who run the hotel.  The extra little steps they take to make your stay exceptional was the highlight of the trip.

title: In a city that never sleeps, this gem is a respite of relaxation
text: From the moment you are welcomed through the doors, the staff is warm and kind. The lobby and rooms have an understated elegance that, in juxtaposition with the hustle of the city, make you feel relaxed and at home. The room amenities are neat and well appointed. The location on the west side is ideal, with many options for shopping and dining all around you. Though I stayed for business, I would absolutely bring my family back to share in the experience.

title: EPIC NYC
text: From the moment you walk through the door at Pendry Manhattan West, a feeling that whatever is going on in your life is going to be OK, takes over. Every aspect of the stay is next level. The tile in the bathrooms, the comfort of the sheets, the room service, the customer service...Romantic, comfortable, exhilarating.

title: Love Pendry Manhattan West!
text: This was the second Pendry property we have stayed in, and 4th Montage/Pendry.  We absolutely loved everything about the hotel.  The Margarita's were awesome. The burger and breakfast was fantastic.  The room was amazing. The Staff notably McCord and Daniel made us feel so welcome.  We loved our time at the property and cannot wait to come back. 10 out of 10 stars. New York is back baby!!

title: A Manhattan West Sanctuary
text: We had a wonderfully warm and quiet stay.  The staff made us feel like residents in a door man building.  The experience exceeded our expectations.  The rooms are beautiful.  A separate space for the toilet and shower is a great touch and the Gym/Exercise facility is fantastic.  This will be our go to hotel in NYC

title: Serene and Luxurious Respite
text: This new hotel is the perfect place to decompress after a busy day in NYC. The design is modern and minimal, but very warm and comfortable. The staff is superb-- managers Annalisa and Anastassiya reached out to me prior to arrival to ask what time I would be arriving and if I had any preferences, and they were able to take care of everything I needed. The Front Desk agents Paul, John and bellmen Juan, Thinley, and Steffan were all so gracious and friendly. I appreciated the excellent complimentary shoe shine by Thinely. The room was perfect-- spacious, elegant, functional. They didn't miss any details. The bar is extremely attractive and a perfect place to catch up with a friend. I also had a great workout in the fitness center and enjoyed the natural light and vaulted ceilings. In Room Dining was delicious. The rooftop terrace and lobby level restaurant are not yet open, but they do have a restaurant on the 4th floor which I did not have an opportunity to try, but looks very chic. Neighborhood is great too, lots within walking distance including a Broadway show! Highly, highly recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing hotel and even BETTER staff
text:
Where to begin....our entire stay was fantastic. Arrival to the hotel was flawless, service during stay was personal and departing the hotel felt like leaving family behind.

The rooms are delightful and fresh. The finishes, decor and design are top notch.

The hotel was such a calm oasis after a long day of hustle and bustle in the city.

Highly recommend if coming to NYC for any reason whether it be business or leisure. Thank you again for a great stay!

title: Welcome to NY!
text: Candidate for best hotel in NYC. Intimate and classy. Location is very good, with lots of amenities in the immediate vicinity. Rooms exceptionally well done, and service extremely responsive but not stuffy. We will certainly be back.

title: Impeccable service
text: What a warm, welcoming, hard-working crew staffing this gorgeous new hotel.  There is a commitment to service with universal buy-in from everyone I came across during my short 3 day stay.  I recommend this place without hesitation.

title: New favorite hotel in Manhattan!
text: After spending 4 nights at the plaza we decided to extend our NY trip 2 extra nights and wanted to explore a different part of Manhattan. After considering many 5 star options we decided to stay at the Pendry and our only regret was that we didn’t stay there our entire visit! From the moment we arrived we were greeted like family. Juan made us feel incredibly special, and we loved our welcome drink (with the optional “spike” from the bar)! Sasha, the hotel driver, took us to our lunch when it was “too cold to walk”, and the front desk staff, Paul, Violet, Aaron or John warmly greeted us every time we were welcomed back from our daily adventures. The rooms are perfectly appointed (I love the split bathroom concept) and the bed and sheets were heavenly. Every evening our rooms were turned down with the blinds closed for privacy, a sweet surprise and complimentary water (and slippers) next to the bed, and soft music playing with the lighting left on so we wouldn’t have to stumble into a dark room. Lastly, there are fabulous dining/bar options in the hotel as well as nearby, like Citizens and Whole Foods, and we visited the high line and Hudson yard during our stay. If you are considering Equinox or any other luxury hotel in Manhattan I cannot imagine a more perfect hotel than the Pendry. I, personally, will not stay anywhere else from now on!

title: A fantastic new hotel in New York
text:
The Pendry is outstanding in every way. It starts with the great service when you walk through the door. I was so impressed that within 15 minutes of arriving every staff member knew our name. The check in was fast and perfectly arranged. The desk and door staff are incredibly attentive. The hotel has only been open one month and everything was perfectly curated. 
The hotel is magnificent and so calming and relaxing. The lobby is an oasis of calm right in the middle of busy New York. It has a relaxed California vibe throughout with its muted tones and simple but luxurious comfort. The hotel is also super quiet with no crowds at all which is very welcomed during Covid.
The rooms are outstanding with light woods and muted tones. The beds are amongst the most comfortable I have ever slept in. The room size although not large was very spacious by New York standards. The technology and lighting are all state of the art.
The bathroom although not large was well laid out with a nice size walk in shower. The bathroom amenities provided are first class. 
We ate breakfast in the lounge each morning of our 3 day stay. The surroundings are beautiful. The food and service was simply outstanding. 
The location has you right in the middle of Hudson Yards which is an area of Manhattan that has been virtually re-built. You are surrounded by brand new sparkling buildings, shopping, eating and just about anything else you could want. Right around the corner from the hotel is Citizens food court with the finest food court food I have seen, Whole Foods is also there along with the Hudson yards shopping complex being a half a block away. If that isn't enough you can quickly and easily access the High Line. The hotel is also 2 blocks away from MSG and Penn Station. You are right in the middle of everything. 
This is a first class hotel in every sense, it is the new standard in Manhattan. I will never stay at another Manhattan hotel after having stayed at the Pendry. It is a quiet, calm and beautiful hotel right in the middle of it all.  It is expensive but well within what 5 star hotels in New York will cost you. The Pendry is worth every penny, you won't find better. Well done Pendry!

title: Amazing hotel!
text: Absolutely gorgeous!!!  The top notch staff and service made us feel so welcomed. The decor has a modern yet warm vibe to it, refined and refreshing. Our room was so pretty and clean. Was a pleasure to return to our oasis of a room after a full day out and about.  We were surprised with 2 oversized  yummy cookies along with a birthday message.  We loved the Pendry so much that we already booked a room for the holidays! June and Deka were so helpful in booking our stay. Can’t wait for our visit in December!

title: Best Hotel in New York
text: When we arrived, we were greeted by name. The front desk staff was amaziing! We arrived at 11:30 am and was not sure if we could get a early check in, however they were able to check us in with a complementary upgrade. The room was amazing with a fantastic view of the city. The hotel concierge sent us a email prior to our visit for any detailed needs we needed for our visit. When we travel, my wife always likes flowers in the room, just like home. When we arrived the flowers were sitting on the table in the window perfectly for her to see. All of the doorman and bellmen were always attentive from when we arrived to the time we left. Always addressing us by name. The Cadilac car service was a great amenity, we were able to use the service for our show reservations. The great thing about the hotel as well was the location. In the middle of Hudson Yards, with Penn station two blocks away, the Shops and Whole Foods accross the street, and the High Line around the corner, the location could not have been better. Overall an amazing stay, can't wait to return.

title: My New Address When I Visit NYC
text: Wonderful hotel. It's just the right size, and stands in a very good location near Chelsea, the High Line, the Hudson... I typically stay further downtown but I really enjoyed Pendry NYC. I'll be back for sure.

title: Beautiful Hotel with Excellent Service
text: Stephan at the door was like an instant friend! Everyone at the desk was happy to help with all of my questions and  recommendations. The service was A+++++ and the hotel is beautiful!! It has a great vibe. It was so close to Madison Square Gardens! My 17 year old and her friend went to a concert this weekend and this was the perfect place to stay.

title: Fantastic
text: All the staff were very friendly and helpful, awesome rooms and great location. Room was gorgeous. The hotel is located very close to the Hudson Yards mall and shopping. Nice fitness studio. Impeccably clean.

title: Easy luxury
text: Beautiful interiors, excellent service. Staff was detailed, fast, and attentive. Love the spiked drink password at check in and the accommodating early check in and late check out - it makes all the difference.

title: A spacious gem in NYC
text: Beautifully appointed guest rooms, featuring fantastic views, great natural light, super comfortable and timelessly chic, and well thought out floor plans, providing space and calm amidst the hustle and bustle of The City.

title: FANTASTIC!
text: Our family of five (three adult children) stayed at the Pendry. We all cannot say enough great things about this hotel!  The rooms are luxurious, beautifully appointed and extremely comfortable. The real treat is the staff—from the door, to baggage, to front desk/concierge, to housekeeping—they are kind helpful and good at their job. No attitude. The main restaurant had not yet opened but the upstairs restaurant was excellent (had breakfast and one dinner there) and beautifully decorated—a visual treat, actually. The downstairs bar is also gorgeous—intimate and cozy. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: A New Kind of Vibe
text: I recently visited the Pendry West Hollywood so for my trip to ny I thought I'd stay Pendry again plus I love visiting new hotels and spaces.  I'll start by saying Manhattan is so curious because you have those "institutions" or staples of hotels & restaurants that between us I find stale, antiquated and frankly extortionate for what you get in return (you know the ones 25 dollars for an unimaged cocktail with torn leather seats that hasn't update their menu since Nick Noltey was the "sexiest man alive" but people still like to been seen there for whatever reason ... you know the ones 👀) which is why I was buzzing to try a spanking new hotel. The space itself is actually really thoughtfully designed and despite being more modern (no dated drab browns or suffocating drapes here) it is still classic in a New York way. All the tones are calming and the common spaces inviting. I eventually hung out in the front lobby to do some work and the vibe was nice. I was in town just for a few days but concluded every evening with a drink at Bar Pendry, a cozy intimate bar complete with a fireplace. This hotel is what I use to love about some of the hotels here that IMO sort of lost their way the past five years (I won't name names but a few are in SoHo 👀) - it isn't pretentious but still has a special feeling to it, you feel * something * when you're there. The guest room itself was spacious and everything was conveniently placed. The rain shower and soaking tub are to die for - especially if you've had a long flight or busy work week. The location is great too if you're in town for leisure too bcs you're perfectly set in the middle whether you're in the mood to go uptown or downtown. The hotel is really what luxury New York hotel should be - buzzy but not overwhelmingly so, attentive staff but not stuffy or buttoned up, good food and drink - and of course a fireplace. Highly recommend

title: Perfect Space, Perfect Location and Perfect Staff
text: Love the Pendry Manhattan West! Rooms are comfortable, and spacious. Location feels like the new "in" place to be! Hudson Yards, entrance to High Line, easy access to penn station (but you wouldn't know it!!). First time staying in this part of town and it is fantastic! Staff is like all Pendry Hotels ~ warm, welcoming and thoughtful! Would highly recommend!!

title: New favorite in NYC!
text: We had an exceptional experience checking out the new Pendry in Hudson Yards. The hotel is brand new, contemporary and inviting - we love the trendy vibe that Pendry offers. What really makes them stand out is the service. Violet, Paul, Juan and Anastassiya are just a few team members we had the pleasure of meeting and received genuine assistance from.

title: Awesome place with Amazing people
text: New hotel in Manhattan West area! 5min from Moynihan Train Hall station. Located in the new Manhattan West Plaza. Easy access to High Lane and Hudson Yards. Staff is warm and make you feel at home. Rooms are beautiful and spacious, larger than your average NY room size! Pendry Bar is beautiful, ideal to have a drink before or after dinner. Vista Lounge Restaurant has the best chickpea hummus ever!

title: Brand new and wonderful!
text: My first stay at a Pendry but will not be my last.  I love the rooms!  Great size and lots of light.  The staff was very friendly and I love the location by Hudson Yards!  Had a great breakfast in the main dining room and loved the tucked away lobby bar!

title: A must!
text: Love the 05 line- one bedroom corner suites. Service was excellent as was the food. Staff is very friendly. Room service was excellent as was the in room coffee machine. LOVE this property. I would definitely stay here again.

title: We found a gem..
text: Our stay at our hotel has to be the absolute best place we’ve stayed in many years. The management team excellent, the staff excellent. Especially the front door staff. As stated earlier you’re second to none. We will be back very soon.

title: New #1 in NYC
text: We stayed at the Pendry West for a night -- and will definitely come back. The service, quality of the materials and design -- and the bar! Top-notch. We're already planning our next visit, and we'll be at the Pendry for sure. A great discovery!

title: New hotel in Hudson Yards!
text: No teething troubles for this new hotel opening. Wonderful quiet rooms. The bed was really comfortable. The bar on the ground floor is very stylish. Staff were very friendly and helpful. I’ll be back and back a lot. Stayed in a corner skyline corner king.

title: Great staff... great hotel
text: We were made welcome from the minute we walked in the door. Great, friendly, helpful staff. Beautiful, clean room. Hotel is just a short walk from MSG and Hudson Yards. Restaurant is very good. We will definitely return.

title: NYC Has a new gem with Pendry Manhattan West
text:
I recently booked a stay at Pendry Manhattan West. I was unsure about choosing a property that had just opened. However I was pleasantly surprised to experience a well run property that passed all the tests a five star property is expected to deliver on. Open less than a month, the room service was delivered as promised (30 minutes or less), the check-in process was efficient and welcoming, the food and beverage options were above par and delicious and the interiors were sophisticated, current and inviting. The staff was very friendly and accommodating to any need including delivering a microwave to warm up cold takeout food. I have not stayed at other Pendry properties but I look forward to soon visit other properties in Chicago and Park City. I might even half to do a staycation at the new DC property. 

Highly recommended to anyone wanting five star service, a warm staff, chic interiors and a super location next to Hudson Yards and the famous High Line.

title: Pendry Manhattan BEST
text: What a gorgeous new property! I was lucky enough to stay opening weekend and was so impressed with the attention to detail in the service, design, and warm hospitality shown to me by all of the associates. It was also a short walk from Penn station.

title: The only hotel I will now stay in‼️

Madison square garden.    The rooms are perfect and the staff was amazing.  They truly understand customer service.  Thanks to juan,decki,Ana Lise, Paul and Aaron. title: Refreshing Spin on New York Hospitality
text: What a remarkable addition to the NYC Hotel  World.  Now my preferred choice all due to the culture this property boasts.  Not only the beautifully appointed accommodations and views, but hidden delights like Bar Pendry, Garden Room and a full fitness studio accompanied by Peloton Bikes, but it was the Kind, Gracious and Warm Hospitality at its best is what I experienced and enough of it that I have begun to share my recommendations with my own network to seek out Pendry Manhattan West upon their next visit to NYC.  Keep up the great work and you will surely make your mark as well as a refreshed statement in an iconic city that deserves it.

title: Absolutely Exquisite
text: wow, just wow…. no words can adequately describe how amazing everyone and everything was…. awesome location close to Madison Square  Garden, High Line, Little Island and great shopping. I highly recommend!!!

title: AMAZING NEW HOTEL IN AMAZING LOCATION!
text: I just got back from a week of business meetings and stayed at the newly-opened Pendry Manhattan West, which is located in the newly developed Hudson Yards area.  I loved this hotel.  It is so beautifully designed.  Brings a very fresh and California feel to New York City.   I attended some events at the hotel and Bronson and Ro were both exceptional service providers.  I absolutely loved Bar Pendry - so stylish and initiate, and once again with excellent servers.  Shout out to Gina and Orlando for going above and beyond with beverage recommendations.  My housekeeper, Ms. Thubtwn was excellent and so thorough.   And last but not least I must give a HUGE SHOUT OUT to Juan, who welcomed me in/back every day.  His presence at the door is beyond impactful and his hospitality is first class.  I am so impressed with this hotel, can't wait to return in December.  I know it will be a huge success!

title: Great New Location for New Luxury!
text:
Cozy, warm sense of arrival at the new hot spot in West Manhattan. 
People were very nice, just opened Hotel, the brand transmit youthful and modern luxury vibes, nice size of rooms and it look very nice places will be around to dine out. 
Pls try it!

title: Girls weekend
text: Four mom's and our daughters stayed for a long weekend. It is a beautiful new hotel. The staff were helpful, friendly and professional. They were happy to assist with anything we needed. We ate dinner at the hotel, and the food was excellent, the staff was knowledgeable.

title: Absolutely beautiful hotel and a very well trained staff that made us feel very welcome and comfortable
text: We came in for the weekend to celebrate my birthday with friends and family. The welcome staff from outside to in we're friendly and very welcoming. The room was absolutely stunning and clean. The entire weekend felt as if this hotel had been open for years because it was so well run. We cannot wait to return!

title: Exceptional stay
text:
I am on night 3 of my 5 night stay at the Pendry and feel that I would be doing a disservice by not immediately singing the praises of this property. I am a 15 year veteran of the city and would never in a million years have thought this was a good location, but it somehow is! A block from Madison Square Garden, not on my usual list, but very convenient for my daughter’s Harry Styles concert. Just up from the village, my favorite stomping grounds, but only a few blocks from the theater district, which should only be  visited for theater. The entrance to the Highline and Hudson yards are steps away. So, the location is actually quite good.  

But the hotel as a whole gives off a very warm feel. The decor is extremely calming and polished. The staff are exceedingly attentive and really make all the difference. As one would expect of a Montage property, they immediately remember who you are and what you like. However, I have discovered that even though I expect that level of service from many high end establishments, I rarely actually receive it, but I did here. 

The rooms are lovely. Thoughtful floor plans in all of them. We are a large group and have 2 double rooms, a king room and a corner studio. All of the rooms are far larger than a typical NYC hotel room with an incredibly well thought out floor plan. But the kicker in these rooms is the rounded window. Photos do not do it any justice. It makes the room feel incredibly expansive and takes full advantage of those amazing NYC views.
 
To sum it up, this is an absolute treat to stay in Manhattan.  Book it now before the word gets out and it is completely booked up.

title: Can I live here!?
text: Absolutely loved my stay at Pendry Manhattan West. The hotel is gorgeous and the attention to detail is unmatched. The entire staff was so welcoming and kind. A 10/10 experience and can't wait to come back.

title: Please can I go back?
text: What an amazing experience at the Pendry Manhattan West!  The rooms are luxurious, yet comfortable and much larger than you'd normally see in New York. The curved window provided such an amazing view of the city. The bed was by far the comfiest bed I've ever slept in at a hotel. The staff made me feel like I was their number one priority from the moment I stepped into the building.  The bar was fun and beautifully designed. The rooftop terraces were amazing.  The only problem was that my stay was only one night!  I can't wait to go back.

title: LOVE IT HERE
text:
I had the most amazing stay at Pendry Manhattan West. The staff was so accommodating and welcoming! The beds were so comfortable and the rooms were spacious!

Not only that, Zou Zou's is one of the most beautiful restaurants I've ever seen!

Overall 10/10 experience and I can't wait to be back!!!

title: Beautiful hotel in the newest NYC hot spot.
text:
Pendry Manhattan West is one of a kind - there is definitely nothing else like this in New York City. It's part of a new development called Manhattan West near Madison Square Garden, the Theater District, Hudson Yards, and more. It's the perfect place to stay before or after visiting any of those attractions. Manhattan West has a ton of amazing shops and restaurant - including Katsuya, Ci Siamo (the newest Danny Meyer restaurant) Zou Zou's (from the restaurant group behind Don Angie) and more. It's the coolest new neighborhood in New York City. 

I also have to mention that the service at the hotel was unbelievable. I was only there for 2 nights, and the staff consistently greeted me by name and helped with anything I needed. I truly felt at home!

title: Manhattan's Best New Hotel! Can I move in?
text: Pendry Manhattan West is New York's newest and most needed hotel in the market. Located on 33rd Street between 9th & 10th Avenue, the site is incredibly easy to get to from major transportation and via car. The moment I arrived, the staff at the front opened my car door, grabbed my bag and kindly guided me to the front desk. The scent upon arrival was so lovely and not overpowering. The front desk staff was incredibly welcoming, kind and professional. Every detail was considered and the entire experience was so impressive. My room overlooked the Manhattan West plaza which is now full of tremendous dining and shopping. Pendry Bar is going to be my new favorite bar in New York. It's intimate atmosphere and décor drew me in. As a Californian myself, I particularly love Pendry's California-inspired take on luxury. I'm beyond excited to have a Pendry in New York and seriously wish I could move in. I highly recommend you stay, visit and return again! I know I will.

title: Amazing stay at the Pendry!
text: I had a wonderful experience at the Pendry Manhattan West. The room was elegant, the views were great, the bed was comfortable, and the staff were all extremely welcoming. I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Incredible
text:
Staying at the Pendry Manhattan West is absolutely incredible.  The beds are heavenly and the tables in the rooms are perfect to work from, with tons of natural sunlight.  The bathrobes are the best I've ever worn - so soft and cozy.  The Pendry Bar on the ground floor and the bar on the 4th floor are beautifully designed and have an incredible vibe; I think they will truly become one of New York's iconic hotel bars.  
Not to mention the hotel is located in the center of the Manhattan West plaza so you can wake up and get breakfast from Danny Meyer's Daily Provisions and have dinner at the incredible Zou Zous, inside the hotel.  Highly recommend!!

title: Birthday trip
text: I visited Pendry Manhattan west for my Birthday and had a fabulous time . When i arrived i was greeted  by Anastassiya   at the front desk and she was so helpful and accommodating. I loved the welcome drink she offered us . Our room was beautiful and larger than what i usually see in New    York. When i entered my room there were Black and white cookies with a wonderful birthday card from McCord the food and beverage manager. I ordered room service during my stay and Ousman the server who delivered my food was the best . At the front door Juan was so helpful with my luggage and with an umbrella when it rained. I cannot recommend this property more everyone that i encountered at the Pendry west made my birthday trip forever memorable, i can’t wait to return

title: TOP NOTCH Service and Gorgeous Design
text:
I was able to experience Pendry Manhattan West days after their new opening and I and rave enough about my time at the hotel. The service was top notch. Their training program must be very well thought out as from arrival to departure, the service was seamless. Even on departure, Juan (the bellman door gentleman) was so endearing that all the way to my car door I felt the staff were super happy to be working there and it showed. The design is so soothing (lots of light natural wood colors to their green plants that give NY the feel of California) and the lighting in the evening is super warm and inviting. Bar Pendry is very cool and their pebble ice made my drink look super fancy (never knew of pebble ice!). Evelyn at Zou Zou's is one of the bartenders that was super engaging and interesting!  Staff is typically what makes a luxury hotel and Pendry Manhattan West has both; service and design which makes the best of both worlds. 

I am not new to Montage, yet new to staying at Pendry brand and pleased to have! A must try!

title: new favorite hotel in NYC
text: Having never stayed in this neighborhood before, I was uncertain of how the experience would play out.  Loved the Pendry Hotel and loved the overall Hudson Yards area.  Whole Foods close by was so convenient.  Overall excellent experience at the hotel.  Very friendly, professional and knowledgeable staff.  Always willing to research further to give me a complete answer.  The rooms were beautiful adn felt luxurious.  Extremely cozy bed, spacious bathroom and good closet space. The best housekeeping experience I have ever had at a hotel - my room was sparkling clean and immaculate every day.  Very impressive.

title: Amazing Hotel
text: The Pendry is an amazing hotel - certainly the best I've stayed in while in NYC.  The rooms are spotless, the staff is over the top friendly, and they made our entire group feel welcome and safe.  I highly recommend staying here.

title: 10 10 10!  Everything about this hotel is a 10!
text: Exceptional service and staff.  The best of the best.  The materials used for this hotel including the lighting was exquisite.  The staff were so helpful and friendly which made our stay ever the nicest.  AThis hotel has it down!

title: Fantastic new hotel in NYC
text: I was thrilled to be a guest of the Pendry Manhattan West during it's first week open in September 2021. The property is beautiful, my (corner king) room was exceptionally large for NYC, the staff is kind and professional, and the location can not be beat if arriving in NY by train!

title: The best five-star experience
text: I can't say enough about how amazing this hotel was. I was one of the first guests to check in and have to say, what I thought five-star hotels should be has completely changed. From the moment I walked in, everyone was extremely welcoming and accommodating. The hotel, the restaurant, the rooms are so luxurious and the service was impeccable. I cannot wait to come back and experience it all over again.

title: Trendy Luxury in NYC
text: This is a wonderful hotel in Manhattan West. The staff was warm and welcoming, the building stunning, and the location, perfect for events at the Garden, or conducting business in the nearby office buildings of Hudson Yards. The rooms are very spacious (Especially for New York), and have the latest tech available (GIANT TVs in all rooms, and very fast WIFI). If you find yourself needing a place to stay in this part of town,  I would certainly consider the Pendry!

title: Phenomenal property and great experience
text: The hotel is beautiful and the guest room was very nice.  The restaurant and bar areas, along with great quality, were very inviting and comfortable.  The staff are 100% welcoming and very helpful when help is needed.  I am highly recommending this property.
